title: NOCD: OCD Treatment App
description:
Made by people with OCD, along with some of the world's top experts. NOCD offers live video-based OCD therapy and in-between session support, right in the NOCD platform. Get matched with a licensed OCD therapist in your state from the comfort of your device, and start effective OCD therapy via video, text, and more.

Live video sessions with an OCD Therapist:
- Match with an OCD therapist
- Personalize your treatment plan
- Do ‚Äúface-to-face‚Äù ERP therapy online through live video sessions

Support between each session:
- Use OCD therapeutic tools 24/7
- Message your therapist anytime
- Learn what helps other people from a peer community

WHAT IS OCD?

OCD is a common psychiatric disorder that involves repetitive, unwanted thoughts and compulsive behaviors intended to reduce the anxiety caused by those thoughts. Commonly misunderstood as an annoying personality quirk, OCD usually involves intense distress and can become completely debilitating.

IS NOCD THERAPY EFFECTIVE?

NOCD live video therapy has been shown to be as effective as face-to-face therapy. Our model is research-backed by a Columbia University Medical Center study, which found a reduction in OCD severity by an average of 40% in 8 weeks.

WHO ARE THE NOCD THERAPISTS?

NOCD therapists include licensed counselors, psychologists, and social workers, and they all are trained in exposure and response prevention, or ERP, the most effective OCD treatment. All NOCD therapists are managed by our clinical leadership team, who have 20+ years experience treating OCD and have designed some of the world‚Äôs top OCD treatment programs.

IS NOCD SECURE?

Our services are powered by AWS and Aptible, both of which are SOC2 and HIPAA compliant. Your therapy data is stored in the AdvancedMD EHR that also complies with SOC2 and HIPAA requirements. All medical notes and records are restricted to you and your clinician. Furthermore, in addition to internal privacy safeguards, we regularly enlist security researchers to assess our services for vulnerabilities. For more information, find our complete
 Privacy Policy at https://www.treatmyocd.com/privacy-policy/, and Terms of use at https://www.treatmyocd.com/terms/

_

NOCD, Inc. is not a treatment company, and the NOCD app is not intended as a standalone treatment. Although this app is developed with clinicians to closely resemble established treatment protocols, it is intended to be used in conjunction with a therapist or another medical provider.

recentChanges: üåü We've simplified the onboarding flow for therapy members to help you connect with your therapist immediately after sign up. üåü
comments: The ERP tools are easy to navigate & well designed. I've been enjoying them. The forum community is almost completely unmoderated & is full of very sick, uninformed people, including teenagers, reassuring each other, compulsively seeking answers, posting many times a day begging to be aided in their compulsions. It is reckless to create space for recovery & have no enforcement of healthy habits. Carl is the only active moderator. Tools are great. Community is toxic & will make newbies sicker

I'm a computer engineering student and the idea of making this app someday, just came into my mind right now since i have ocd myself. So i searched it and boom! What a wonderful app they've made. I really appreciate it although i kinda had one of my first app ideas been made beforehand, it is still a perfect app for ocd specially if your location supports more functionalities..my location doesn't but I'm still using other brilliant options there. So thank you‚ù§
I love this app, I'm able to resonate with others who have OCD as well as use the sos feature to help me when I'm having intrusive thoughts.
It's a great app but I wish that the free 15-min call and therapists are available for those outside the US. It would also be great to have a chat section.
I've learned so much about myself in such a small amount of time. Amazing app, super helpful for phobias too

title: Obsessive Compulsive Disorder Treatment
description:
Obsessive compulsive disorder is a mental health condition gone through by around 2% of the general population. In this post, you'll understand one of the most interesting facts about OCD.

App Feature:

- Will update more tips and content in the future.
- will adding tips and audio content, video for make you easier learning.

Read Why Learn obsessive compulsive disorder is important :

1. It Stems from Anxiety - Obsessive compulsive disorder is classified as an anxiety disorder, according to the National Institute of Mental Health.

2. It is Disruptive - Like the majority of anxiety disorders, obsessive compulsive disorder brings about significant incapacity to the person suffering from this disease. According to the National Institute of Mental Health, OCD is characterized not only by obsessive, intrusive thoughts, but also by ritualistic compulsions. The compulsions are intended to alleviate the anxiety of the obsessions, but this finishes up grow to be vicious circle. Compulsions solely provide temporary relief from nervousness, in order that they should be regularly performed. In a way, the person winds up being governed by these rituals.

3. It is More Common Than You Think - OCD affects nearly 2.2 million American adults each year. What's more, it affects children and teenagers. According to the NYU Child Study Center, almost one million little ones are afflicted by OCD each year. In fact, OCD symptoms typically start in the child years and continue into age of puberty and the adult years.

Download obsessive compulsive disorder app for learning more.

title: Liberate: My OCD Fighter
description:
Liberate: My OCD Fighter brings to you an easy way to conquer your anxieties from the comfort of home. In a virtual setting designed to put you at ease, this app complements the aid received from your specialist. It takes therapy out of the confines of a therapist‚Äôs office.

With a user-friendly interface and a simple, functional design, the app provides a platform for you to manage your OCD in an effective way. The physical features of the app, designed entirely by 14-20-year-old students, allow for a graphic and interactive experience for the users, thus creating a space to easily fight compulsions.

The app helps you learn more about OCD, providing information about the causes and types of OCD and methods to combat it. It offers features to track your compulsions, building an environment suitable to control their OCD. Controlling OCD for the long-term is done using various ways to resist and weaken compulsions.

1. Scheduling your Worry Time - You can schedule specific periods of worry, which will, in the long run, reduce the time spent performing compulsions.

2. Controlling your Compulsions - You can also manipulate their compulsions, including changing them (their frequency and order), postponing them (offering mild resistance), shortening/retarding them (effectively minimizing their effect on your life).

3. Creating a Fear Ladder - The app also allows you to create their own Fear Ladder of triggers for each of your compulsions, and perform exposure exercises to normalize these triggers. You can perform CBT exercises on the app, which helps analyze your thought processes.

4. Setting Goals for yourself - All these exercises can be planned using our Goal-Setting feature. Using this, you can set short-term, medium-term and long-term goals, thus motivating yourself to fight your anxiety.

5. Connecting with your Therapist through regular Reports  - The app sends weekly progress reports to your therapist with data it collects automatically through your exercises. These reports include data regarding the effect of your compulsions on your emotions, the number of OCD attacks you suffered over the week (also relating your compulsions to the time of day), and various triggers and calming factors specific to each compulsion. The app also allows the scheduling of the OCI-R between certain intervals of time, to measure the severity of your compulsions. The report also covers data regarding anxiety levels experienced by the user during their exposure exercises as well as the status of homework assignments given to them by their therapist.

6. Getting External Support - You will also be able to designate certain support members whom you trust, who will be notified when you suffer an attack or have multiple compulsions and other situations where external help is critical. This ensures that you are not alone in your journey to conquer your OCD.

Liberate: My OCD Fighter is an all-in-one app that connects your compulsions, obsessions, personal goals and thoughts to your specialist-advised therapy. It makes for a planned resolution of your anxieties and is designed to generate more positive thoughts and emotions.

The app helps users realize feasible and implementable solutions to their anxieties, using clinically proven techniques and modern methods of combating OCD.

recentChanges: Minor improvements and bug fixes.
comments: I've never heard or seen this app when I searched for apps to tame my OCD. For years I've suffered with OCD, and I've gotten way better with therapy and medication, but I slip sometimes. This app has helped me when I need a quick reminder or a little help with something. I reccomend it. Thank you developers!

Now, I'm not very good with these kinds of apps, but it's very nice. A little complicated sure, but overall, it had a idea and a good execution. They managed to put it together in a way that wasn't very stressful and made me feel at ease. Now, I didn't have it for a long time because, again, I'm not good with these things. But besides being a little complex, I think it's nice. Especially after the really bad experience I had with NOCD, it was nice to see an app that made me feel safe.

This app is so incredibly useful at helping me track my compulsions and that's helped me develop plans and commitments that genuinely work... not only does the app have a remarkable UI, but the creators were so helpful for any doubt throughout the process. The app provides for almost every single scenario that you would possibly need and that inclusivity is so beneficial. I've been recommending Liberate to every single person I know who works with/has OCD. In full: thank you for this app! üíì

this has been really helpful! the reminders in particular have made things way easier. the app also has this great feature that when it thinks you're in trouble (start rating worry very high) it asks if youre ok!

I'm so happy I found this app. I've only had it a week and I'm already getting control of my OCD. I love the worry time feature and all the exercises. I've become more aware of my triggers and I'm slowly working through them.

title: Obsessive Compulsive Disorder (OCD)
description:
Obsessive-compulsive disorder (OCD) is an anxiety disorder in which time people have recurring, unwanted thoughts, ideas or sensations (obsessions) that make them feel driven to do something repetitively (compulsions). The repetitive behaviors, such as hand washing, checking on things or cleaning, can significantly interfere with a person‚Äôs daily activities and social interactions.

Many people have focused thoughts or repeated behaviors. But these do not disrupt daily life and may add structure or make tasks easier. For people with OCD, thoughts are persistent and unwanted routines and behaviors are rigid and not doing them causes great distress. Many people with OCD know or suspect their obsessions are not true; others may think they could be true (known as poor insight). Even if they know their obsessions are not true, people with OCD have a hard time keeping their focus off the obsessions or stopping the compulsive actions.

A diagnosis of OCD requires the presence of obsession and/or compulsions that are time-consuming (more than one hour a day), cause major distress, and impair work, social or other important function.

This app helps to remedy the obsessive-compulsive disorder and compulsions.

Covered Topics: 
Introduction
Overcome OCD
Psychological Treatments
How to Identify It
Various Causes of OCD
Cognitive Behavioral Therapy
Facts and Treatment Information
A Spiritual View
Details and Techniques
Can it Be Cured Permanently
Powerful Help to Stop OCD
Introduction to Obsessive Compulsive Disorder
Treating Obsessive Compulsive Disorder
A Spiritual View of Obsessive-Compulsive Disorders
Introduction to Obsessive Compulsive Disorder

title: GG OCD Anxiety & Depression
description:
"Most credible OCD App" (highest credibility score of 4.28 out of 5) -International OCD Foundation

MANAGING OCD IS POSSIBLE
Throw away unhelpful thoughts. Embrace helpful ones. Learn to identify your self-talk and respond quickly. Train daily and improve your coping and mental wellbeing.

SCIENCE BACKED
New findings support the effectiveness of the core mechanism used in GG OCD app. Our research supports these findings and shows the positive effect of the app on OCD symptoms and maladaptive beliefs.
According to CBT models, negative self talk ‚Äì individuals‚Äô ongoing interpretations of the self, others and the world - maintain psychological difficulties such as low self esteem, obsessive and maladaptive thinking. 

HOW DO I RELIEVE MY OCD?
Our beliefs have the potential to bias and affect our ability to deal with daily situations. Balancing this natural bias and building helpful thinking habits is shown to improve OCD beliefs and reduce symptoms.

OCD, BELIEFS AND SELF TALK
Beliefs and self-talk are interrelated. Once we learn to embrace healthier and more adaptive self talk, it can change our beliefs and help us become more resilient.

HOW GG OCD WORKS
The application is designed to:
1. Increase your awareness of unhelpful thinking
2. Train you to identify and challenge unhelpful thoughts.
3. Increase your access to helpful thoughts.
4. Increase the automaticity of the above processes.
5. Provide daily mood and self esteem boost.

IS THIS APP SIMILAR TO PSYCHOLOGICAL THERAPY?
Our app platform is not designed to be used as a therapy or treatment, however:
1. It is being used by OCD CBT psychologists as a complementing tool.
2. It helps in maintaining healthy thinking during or after therapy.
3. It is found to relieve symptoms of anxiety, worries, obsessions and more. 

OCD AND THOUGHTS
The basic task in the app is simple - you will be presented with thoughts. If the thought promotes negative self-talk - throw it away by dragging it on-screen. If the thought promotes helpful thinking, accept it by dragging it towards you.

As you make helpful thinking a habit, this process becomes automatic and easier.
 
HOW MUCH SHOULD I TRAIN EACH DAY?
We believe mobile apps allow us to learn and train quickly and effectively. GG OCD is designed to be most effective in short training sessions. You are advised to complete up to 3 levels per day, which should only take between 2-4 minutes.

LEVELS AND JOURNEYS
The app's many topics and themes are broken down into more than 40 levels. Each level has a pool of self-talk thoughts. Complete a set of thoughts to finish the level.
To further strengthen learning of supportive self-talk, some levels you complete are followed by a quick memory game.

The topics include: self esteem, belief in change, self criticism, negative thinking, coping, sin, harm, comparing, perfectionism, emotions, social fears, self as an object, danger and threat, seeing the beauty in the world, fear of abandonment, fear of contamination and more.

You can also test yourself to see how well your confidence progresses with our self assessment tool.

Training using this application, allows for gradual, steady learning of more adaptive self-talk thereby helping to break the vicious thought cycle maintaining low self-esteem.

DO I HAVE TO PURCHASE PREMIUM CONTENT?
GG OCD is designed so you can enjoy the benefits of healthy self-talk without necessarily having to purchase anything. After laying the foundations, premium content lets you discover more advanced, specific topics as well as enjoy complementing modules and premium features.

LEARN MORE ABOUT GGTUDE APPS
Visit our website: http://ggtude.com

OTHER APPS BY GGTUDE
GG Self Care
GG Body Image Distress & Preoccupation
GG Confidence & Self esteem
GG Depression
GG ROCD

comments: This app went from a concise OCD app to an unfocused all-in-one app that deals with too many topics in an unfocused fashion. The old app used to have a "daily play" option once you progressed through the "levels" that let you drop into the app for a nice summary of all the previous statements merged into one level. This doesn't seem to exist anymore. The app is clunky now. The only thing good about it is that the UI looks modern but everything else is trash.

I have the full version and it's genuinely helpful for OCD, but it's also overpriced for how scarce the content is. Also, lots of misspelling errors exist in the app, which make it feel unprofessional especially when you're paying. I'd like to see the devs add around triple the content (more types of exercises and little games to help!) and correct the spelling mistakes. These are two big issues, but I would still recommend the free version to people for calming from OCD caused anxiety attacks.

It's not the most helpful app ever but does kill time and in the moment helps you say nice things to yourself. Worth a shot if you dont know what to say to yourself but doesnt really help to implement those behaviors. Feels more like studying flash cards for a test before learning the material if that makes any sense.

Great app! I do not focus on how fast i go through it, but work to internalize some of the advice as different way of viewing things... One of my fav sayongs is - feeling pass, change, and transform..... Would also be nice if the app included mental compulsions, such as analyzing and reassurance in the assessment... Also, could use an update on a few spelling errors.

Great app! Simple and intuitive but effective. One recommendation: please enable users to proceed to the next level although time limit was exceeded. Personally I like to take time to reflect on each message instead of rushing through them. I believe many others would do the same. Do that and it'll be 5 stars!

title: Perspectives OCD
description:
Currently, Perspectives OCD is only available as part of a research study at Massachusetts
General Hospital. The research study is testing the benefits of Perspectives OCD as a therapy app for obsessive compulsive disorder. You can express your interest and find more information on our website https://perspectivesocd.health
Perspectives OCD is a cognitive behavioral therapy app for obsessive compulsive disorder
(OCD), created by leading researchers at Massachusetts General Hospital to reduce its
severity.
- Based on evidence-based cognitive behavioral therapy
- Personalized 12-week program
- Simple exercises you can do from the comfort of your own home
- Get paired with a coach to answer your questions
- Available at no cost
Regain control of your life, so you can start living it better!
CAUTION ‚Äì Investigational Device. Limited by Federal (or United States) law to investigational use.
Support contact
We care about your privacy, so please read the following information carefully.
PATIENTS
If you have any questions, concerns, or technical difficulties, please contact the healthcare
professional who provided you with the activation code for this mobile therapy.

HEALTHCARE PROFESSIONALS
For support with any aspect of Perspectives OCD, please contact Support Services via email support@perspectives.health. For privacy reasons, please do not share any patient personal data with us.

Compatible OS versions
Perspectives OCD is compatible with Android version 6 or greater.
descriptionHTML:
Currently, Perspectives OCD is only available as part of a research study at Massachusetts
General Hospital. The research study is testing the benefits of Perspectives OCD as a therapy app for obsessive compulsive disorder. You can express your interest and find more information on our website https://perspectivesocd.health
Perspectives OCD is a cognitive behavioral therapy app for obsessive compulsive disorder
(OCD), created by leading researchers at Massachusetts General Hospital to reduce its
severity.
- Based on evidence-based cognitive behavioral therapy
- Personalized 12-week program
- Simple exercises you can do from the comfort of your own home
- Get paired with a coach to answer your questions
- Available at no cost
Regain control of your life, so you can start living it better!
CAUTION ‚Äì Investigational Device. Limited by Federal (or United States) law to investigational use.
Support contact
We care about your privacy, so please read the following information carefully.
PATIENTS
If you have any questions, concerns, or technical difficulties, please contact the healthcare
professional who provided you with the activation code for this mobile therapy.

HEALTHCARE PROFESSIONALS
For support with any aspect of Perspectives OCD, please contact Support Services via email support@perspectives.health. For privacy reasons, please do not share any patient personal data with us.

Compatible OS versions
Perspectives OCD is compatible with Android version 6 or greater.

title: OCD Test
description:
Obsessive-Compulsive Disorder (OCD) may present with obsessions, compulsions, or both. Obsessions and compulsions are often distressing, time-consuming, and impairing.

Everyone has worried about germs or losing something or someone getting hurt. These thoughts tend to be fleeting and do not disrupt daily living. If these thoughts are constantly occurring, uncontrollable, intrusive, and cause a lot of anxiety or stress, then they may be considered 'obsessions.'

Everyone has felt the need to double check that the door is locked or arrange items in a correct way. If you perform these actions like a ritual or with rigid rules in order to prevent or reduce anxious thoughts, or if these actions greatly disrupt your life, then they may be considered 'compulsions.'

This app is designed to evaluate your symptoms of OCD with a scientifically-supported 18-question test. It uses the Obsessive-Compulsive Inventory - Revised (OCI-R), a screening questionnaire for OCD that is commonly used in research and healthcare settings. The OCI-R is also helpful for monitoring your OCD-related symptoms during and after treatment.

OCD Test contains four tools:
- Start Test: take the OCI-R questionnaire to assess OCD symptoms
- History: see a history of your test scores to monitor your symptoms over time
- Information: learn about OCD and discover additional resources that can help you on your path to recovery
- Reminder: set up notifications to re-take the questionnaire at your convenience

Disclaimer: The OCI-R is NOT a diagnostic test. A diagnosis can only be provided by a qualified healthcare professional. Please consult a physician or mental health professional if you are concerned about OCD.¬†

References: Foa, E. B., Huppert, J. D., Leiberg, S., Langner, R., Kichic, R., Hajcak, G., & Salkovskis, P. M. (2002). The Obsessive-Compulsive Inventory: development and validation of a short version.¬†Psychological assessment,¬†14(4), 485.

American Psychiatric Association. (2013). Diagnostic and statistical manual of mental disorders (5th ed.). Washington, DC: Author.

OCD is a mental disorder where people feel the need to check things repeatedly, , or have certain thoughts repeatedly. People are unable to control either the thoughts or the activities for more than a short period of time. Common activities include hand washing, counting of things, and checking to see if a door is locked. Some may have difficulty throwing things out. These activities occur to such a degree that the person's daily life is negatively affected.

title: BrainwaveX OCD
description:
BrainwaveX OCD is a brainwave therapy for Obsessive-Compulsive Disorder (OCD).

Obsessive compulsive disorder (OCD) is a mental health condition where a person has obsessive thoughts and compulsive activity.
An obsession is an unwanted and unpleasant thought, image or urge that repeatedly enters a person's mind, causing feelings of anxiety, disgust or unease.
A compulsion is a repetitive behaviour or mental act that someone feels they need to carry out to try to temporarily relieve the unpleasant feelings brought on by the obsessive thought.

BrainwaveX OCD consist of 2 different sessions. 
Session 1 is 4:30 minutes.
Session 2 is 4 minutes.

All sessions are necessary to have a complete therapy!


Get ready for a total natural healing.

Enjoy your explorations.

http://www.brainwavex.com

title: Compulsive
description:
"So minimal, so addictive" -- LA Times.  A palette of beautiful colors needs your help to get organized. This quick color matching puzzle game is easy to learn and difficult to put down. Ready to get Compulsive?

‚ñ† FEATURES

‚ñ° Addictive color matching puzzle game
‚ñ° Multiple Game Modes including Arcade, Strategy, Zen, and Challenge
‚ñ° Power-ups: Organizer, Cleaner, Duster
‚ñ° Turn-based multiplayer with Google Play Services
‚ñ° Beautiful bright candy like colors with a modern theme 
‚ñ° Awesome animations, music, and sound 
‚ñ° Play games in 60 seconds, 30 moves, or unlimited
‚ñ° Google Play leaderboards and achievements for all game modes
‚ñ° Facebook leaderboard on Arcade mode
‚ñ° UI Optimized for Android phones and tablets

‚ñ† RULES

‚ñ° Join four or more tiles of the same color to clear them off the board and score points. 
‚ñ° White clean tiles will clear all tiles of a specific color off the board.
‚ñ° Clear multiple groups of tiles in a single move for bonus points.

‚ñ† POWER-UPS

‚ñ° Power-ups include Duster, Cleaner, Organizer, and Visionary power-ups.
‚ñ° Duster removes a tile off the board and counts towards the combo.  Use it to start your next combo and score bigger points. Limit 5 per game.
‚ñ° The Cleaner power-up removes an entire color from the board.  This is just like the white cleaner tile that appears on the board.  Limit is 3 per game.
‚ñ° The Organizer power-up gives you 10 seconds to arrange the board however you want without any tiles exploding.  This allows you to create really big groups and and even bigger combos for a massive bonus.  Limit is 1 per game.
‚ñ° Visionary power-up is a one time purchase that provides color tile counts on the board on every game played.  Helps you to focus on what color to use to build your next group.  Also tells you the best time to use your Organizer power-up!

‚ñ† TIPS

‚ñ° Create larger groups of tiles for bigger scores. 
‚ñ° Use the white tiles to clean up a mess or score some quick points. 
‚ñ° Set up tiles on the game board so when one group clears others will follow. A bonus multiplier is given on the total number of groups you clean up in a single move. 
‚ñ° Connect the leaderboard to Google Play and  Facebook and crush your friend's scores.

‚ñ† EDITORIAL REVIEWS
‚ñ° "Play Picks", "Abstract Puzzlers", "Brain Teasers" "Multiplayer" "Summer Promotion" -- Google Play Store Featured
‚ñ° "Play Compulsive ‚Äì the game is a time-swallowing monster of addictiveness!" -- AndroidTapp
‚ñ° "Compulsive Is a Beautifully Holo Match-4 Game" -- Playboard

‚ñ† CONTACT

‚ñ° Suggestion?  In the app please tap MORE, ABOUT, and SEND FEEDBACK to talk directly to our team.
‚ñ° Problem?  In the app please tap MORE, ABOUT, and REPORT PROBLEM which will attach a log file for us to investigate your issue.
‚ñ° Like us at http://www.facebook.com/CompulsiveGame
‚ñ° Follow us at http://twitter.com/tmsoft
‚ñ° Visit us at http://www.tmsoft.com/compulsive/

‚ñ† NOTE

‚ñ° Compulsive will occasionally display ads which you can remove through in-app-purchase by tapping STORE / BUY + / NO ADS
‚ñ° All game modes and power-ups can be unlocked without purchase.
‚ñ° Adding social networks allows you to see your friend's score.  We do not post messages to your wall or your friend's wall.  Publish permission required to upload scores to the shared leaderboards.

title: Anxiety Relief Hypnosis - Stress, Panic Attacks
description:
If you‚Äôre seeking stress relief or anti anxiety help, you are not alone. Anxiety and depression affect millions and can make everyday life unbearable. But if you suffer from an anxiety disorder, don‚Äôt get frustrated using an anxiety tracker and seeing no improvement. Before giving up, try tapping into the power of hypnotherapy with a guided anxiety meditation written and read by a certified hypnotherapist. This anxiety help app is designed to show you how to reduce anxiety and to learn anxiety management techniques. When your anxiety is reduced, you may also notice an improvement in related symptoms like anger management, OCD, PTSD, or even panic attack relief. You have the power to relieve stress, anxiety and depression ‚Äî see if hypnosis is right for you to unlock your own ability to live your life outside of the shadow of depression and anxiety!*

‚óé A single audio session of 30 minutes a day that is effective* in just 1‚Äì3 weeks
‚óé Hypnosis audio carefully read by the soothing voice of a certified hypnotherapist
‚óé Peaceful background music and nature sounds to help you relax
‚óé Hypnotic Booster with binaural beats to induce your brainwave frequency into an optimal state for receiving hypnotic suggestions
‚óé Separate volume controls for Voice, Background, and Hypnotic Booster
‚óé Awaken at End feature can be disabled at bedtime for a relaxing, restful sleep
‚óé Repeat sessions or loop while you sleep
‚óé Continue listening to background sounds after the session ends

Anxiety Relief Hypnosis is free to try and effective* with the default settings. A one-time in-app purchase is required only if you wish to change the default settings. (Each of our free hypnosis apps includes its own in-app purchase; in-app purchases cannot be shared among separate apps.)

Results not clinically proven. The content and services provided by this Application are for educational purposes only and are not intended to be a substitute for professional medical advice, diagnosis, or treatment. Never rely on information on this Application in place of seeking professional medical advice. Consult your doctor before using this Application if you suffer from a heart condition, mood disorder, epilepsy, or a psychiatric or neurological condition.

Surf City Apps offers a range of hypnosis apps to help you enjoy a healthier, happier, and more abundant life. Tell us how you use our apps to improve your life:

Facebook.com/surfcityapps
Twitter.com/SurfCityApps

CONTACT SUPPORT

TERMS & CONDITIONS

REFERENCES

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hypnosis

Results not clinically proven. The content and services provided by this Application are for educational purposes only and are not intended to be a substitute for professional medical advice, diagnosis, or treatment. Never rely on information on this Application in place of seeking professional medical advice. Consult your doctor before using this Application if you suffer from a heart condition, mood disorder, epilepsy, or a psychiatric or neurological condition.

We fixed a few bugs.

comments: I love it! It really works for me. I was always so tense and full of anxiety, but this started to work right away. If you don't crank the sound up it works better. I don't know who's voice that is but it's so soothing and makes me unwind instantly! Don't change a thing! Thank you to the creators of this app. It's been a God send for my healing from anxiety.

I've been on a severe anxiety attack that went on for 3 days. I was considering hypnosis through a consultant but stumbled upon this app. I paid the extra $$ to move the hypno sound all the way up and to put it on loop so it can play while I'm asleep. After the 1st night of listening my anxiety attack was 70% gone. 2nd night no anxiety. I've downloaded a couple of other hypnosis apps, self esteem, fear and exercise. *UPDATE* It'd be great if I could play all of the apps i unlocked while I sleep

Free yet not free. Although it said the app was free, once you try it, you discover many features are not available until you upgrade to a paid version, never mentioned on the download page. It was impossible to evaluate with so many features unusable.

This had become 1 of my go-to apps at the end of the day. If you don't over expect any sudden results. I just allow it to give me at least 30 min of mindfulness. When used at night I do find I sleep better.
Thankful that it doesn't ask for personal details (name, age, address etc) great job üëç wish more apps were like this. Straight to the point

title: GG Relationship Doubt & Obsessions (ROCD)
description:
Created by Dr. Guy Doron (IDC), clinical psychologist and researcher
Feel like you're missing out on the perfect relationship? Finding it hard to commit? Experiencing constant doubts? Suffering from obsessive thinking? Want to expand your mind and make it more adaptive? GGRO is here to help!

RELIEVING OBSESSIVE THINKING IS POSSIBLE
Throw away negative thoughts. Approach positive ones. Learn to identify your inner self talk and respond quickly. Train daily and improve your wellness.

SCIENCE BACKED
New findings support the effectiveness of the core mechanism used in GG apps.
According to CBT models, negative self talk ‚Äì individuals‚Äô ongoing interpretations of the self, others and the world - maintain psychological difficulties such as low self esteem, mood, obsessive, ROCD and maladaptive thinking. 

HOW DO I MANAGE MY ROCD?
The foundations of a healthy mind are built upon flexible beliefs. Our beliefs have the potential to bias and affect our ability to deal with daily situations. For example, if I believe that ‚Äúmy partner has to be perfect‚Äù or ‚ÄúI have to be 100% certain about my partner‚Äú - I won't be able to live up to these expectations and my ability to deal with relationships will decrease.

BELIEFS AND SELF TALK
Beliefs and self talk are interrelated. Once we learn to embrace healthier and more adaptive self talk, it can change our beliefs and help us get rid of the ones that negatively affect our well being.

HOW GG APPS WORK
The application is designed to:
1. Increase your awareness of negative and obsessive thoughts.
2. Train you to identify and challenge negative thoughts.
3. Increase your access to neutral, adaptive and positive thoughts.
4. Increase the accessibility of the above processes.
5. Provide daily mood and self esteem boost.

IS THIS APP SIMILAR TO PSYCHOLOGICAL THERAPY?
Our app platform is not designed to be used as a therapy or treatment, however:
1. It is being used by CBT therapists as a complementing tool.
2. It helps in maintaining healthy thinking during or after therapy.
3. It is found to relieve symptoms of anxiety, worries, obsessions and relationship OCD.

TRAIN YOUR THOUGHTS
The basic task in the app is simple - you will be presented with thoughts. If the thought promotes negative self talk - throw it away by dragging it on-screen. If the thought promotes positive or neutral thinking, accept it by dragging it towards you.
The longer we train making it a habit, the more automatic this process becomes.
 
HOW MUCH SHOULD I TRAIN EACH DAY?
To feel better and improve your mind‚Äôs flexibility, start today! We believe apps allow us to learn and train quickly and effectively. GG Apps are designed to be most effective in short training sessions. You are advised to complete up to 3 levels per day, which should only take between 2-4 minutes.

LEVELS AND TOPICS
The app's many topics and themes are broken down into more than 40 levels. Each level has a pool of self talk statements (or thoughts). Users are required to complete a random set of 'blocks' to complete the level.

The topics include: self esteem, belief in change, self criticism, negative thinking, coping, positive boost, comparing, perfectionism, embarrassment, uncertainty, commitment anxiety, social fears, self as an object, danger and threat, distrust, fear of abandonment, and more.

Training using this application, allows for gradual, steady learning of more adaptive self-talk thereby helping to break the vicious thought cycle of obsessive thinking.

WHAT IF I COMPLETED ALL THE LEVELS?
The key to using the app is learning new topics, but even more importantly - training daily. There are levels designed as "daily training" for you to play once you completed your base course.

LEARN MORE ABOUT THE FACTS BEHIND GG APPS
Visit our website: http://ggapps.net

OTHER APPS BY GG
GG OCD Training App
GG Body Image Distress & Preoccupation
GG Confidence & Self esteem
Good Blocks

summary: Manage relationship OCD, reduce obsession, doubts & fears - quick daily training
developerAddress: 11 Dov Hoz Street, Tel Aviv, Israel
recentChanges: This release fixes a notification bug so you can now receive daily training reminders and tips.
comments: To each their own, and I can only speak for me here. However, I love this app. I find it stimulations in areas, for me, that I haven't experienced yet or at least helps me to identify problem areas in which to manage them. I love that it is available. It makes me feel content in knowing that regardless of how I feel.. there's still some positive type of response for me to read or engage and thayd helpful.

I guess it's an ok app/game. Pretty boring. All you do is swipe positive affirmations one way and negative ones the other way. There is no "training" or anything, no advice or tips or anything like that.

I was initially embarrassed to try this app and asked myself why anyone would admit to needing this kind of thing by giving a review. But oh my goodness!! This app is wonderful. It conditions the mind to think positively and embrace resilience and that is a beautiful thing. My husband is trying it now, too, and likes it as well. It has helped me already to have a more positive outlook and improved the way I relate to others. I wouldn't have believed it without trying it. So grateful!!
I've definitely seen improvement in managing my thoughts and it's really nice to see an app specifically for rocd. I'm docking a star simply because a $20 pay wall is extreme.

I was unsure at first because some of the exercises *could* (potentially, in certain situations) make things more difficult, if the relationship is abusive, for instance. *HOWEVER*, assuming that the person using the app does not have an abusive partner and is aware of their own weaknesses, I have found this app to be helpful. It definitely helps with intrusive, obsessive thoughts that sometimes creep into my head for no reason. And it helps me keep my crazy under wraps, lol

title: PinkyMind - Online counselling & therapy chat app
description:
Pinkymind is a leading online counselling platform with qualified and certified Psychologist, therapist and Listeners offering counselling and therapy for Stress, Anxiety, Panic attack, Depression, OCD, Relationship issues.

Launched on April 2nd, 2019, platform has handled over 15,000 chat sessions, 2000 therapy sessions.  

IMPORTANT FEATURES:
-	Remote counsellors offering online counselling and therapy over chat, call and video.
-	We offer Online counselling in Hindi, English and other regional languages
-	All counsellors are qualified, certified and experience
-	You can directly schedule the session with therapist or if you need assistance you can take Quick chat for assistance.
-	Each session is for 45 minutes
-	We offer AFFORDABLEAND ANONYMOUS online counseling

QUALIFIED AND CERTIFIED THERAPISTS
The mental illness may look small, but it can be horrific if the situation is not attended early. Please speak up instead of fighting the battle alone. Pinkymind Counselors or Psychologists or therapists are qualified and certified, who are here to help you to fight back against mental illnesses and burnouts. All online counselling sessions are confidential and if you still wish to keep the conversation anonymous you can do it by taking chat or audio appointment.

WHAT IS PINKYMIND? Why do we need it?
Pinkymind is a easy-to-use platform  for emotional online counselling or Psychology app, Online counselling is a medium for people to reach out, who for one reason or another, are hesitant to discuss their problems. The platform aims to address these problems before they fester and escalate. On Pinkymind you can discuss your problems without revealing your identity. The process is quite simple and secure.

WHO NEEDS OUR SERVICE?
a. People who require support to deal with 
-	Depression
-	Anxiety
-	Obsessive Compulsive Disorder
-	Panic attack
-	Post Traumatic Stress Disorder (PTSD)
-	Mood disorders
-	Stress 
-	LGBTQ
-	Gender identity crisis
b. People who feel lonely and are hesitant to reach out due to social stigma.
c. People who don‚Äôt know where to go or whom to reach out to for the support required.
d. People who need online psychologist for family counselling, marriage counselling, personal counselling, child counselling, mental health counselling, psychological online help, Online therapy, career counselling
e. People who searching for counsellor nearby can now download our Pinkymind app and have the feeling the counsellor are near me.

Download Pinkymind app for online counselling and therapy and Book an appointment with the certified counsellor or Psychologist or therapist to have a private conversation today!!

comments: It's an amazing app for people who want healings and want to comeout of their worse situations. They assign you to the counselor according to the problems and as per my experience. It was amazing. I was assigned to Shreya, the therapist ,she made me realise to focus on stuff that I never realised before. Hope anyone reading this and is confused about life. Please go for pinky mind. They will help you come out through. Kudos to them for helping people like us!!
Great app, Would definitely recommend it as well as my counselor Vaishnavi who has been great!

I've been taking sessions for a couple of months and I feel way better than when I started. Vaishnavi, the therapist was really helpful in understanding my case and providing help. There was constant check on the progress from multiple people to ensure I was moving ahead. Overall this has been a ensuring experience.

i am very happy to found this app to cop up with my anxiety and panic attacks i took a CBT session from Vaishnavi she is very calm understanding ,easy to talk and understands your problems from depth so to give a better solution. i can feel the change in myself. Thank You Vaishnavi and pinkymind :)
I am satisfied with this app. I am grateful to Yogesh (one for the counselors) for the wonderful CBT sessions. I am feeling relieved and positive after the sessions.

title: Sanvello for Anxiety, Depression & Stress
description:
The #1 app for stress, anxiety, and depression with over 3.5 million users. 

Rethink how you manage your mental health. Sanvello has all of the support you need in one place: therapy, coaching, self-care tools, and a community that gets it.  

Sanvello gives you clinically proven techniques based on cognitive behavioral therapy (CBT) for dealing with stress, anxiety, depression, trauma-related conditions, or whatever else you may be going through. Research shows it really works: Over 60 percent of Sanvello members demonstrate a 15 percent improvement in their stress, anxiety, and depression levels in less than 30 days.    

Download Sanvello today and have a place to feel better, wherever you go. 
 

FREE ACCESS THROUGH HEALTH PLANS (U.S. ONLY): 
Through our partnerships with insurance providers, 37 million Americans have premium access to Sanvello covered by their health plan, and Sanvello Therapy is also in-network for millions. See if your plan is covered by upgrading in the app and searching for your insurance provider. 

SELF-CARE:  
Get clinically validated techniques to help you manage your moods and thoughts, so you can understand what works for you to feel better. Daily mood tracking, Guided Journeys, coping tools, meditations, and progress assessments help you find relief when you need it and feel better over time.  

COMMUNITY:  
Find a fresh perspective in a judgment-free space. Anonymously participate in active discussion boards and chat groups in the Sanvello community, exploring a diverse range of topics from stress relief techniques to words of encouragement and gratitude. You‚Äôre in charge and surrounded by peer insights‚Äîa simple way to feel less alone. 

COACHING (U.S. ONLY): 
Face new challenges with help from someone you can trust. Sanvello Coaches provide direction, support, and motivation through 1:1 messaging‚Äìjudgment free. You also have an all-access pass to group coaching sessions‚Äîlive classes that help you apply the concepts of CBT to real life‚Äîand all our self-care tools within the app.   

THERAPY (SELECT U.S. STATES): 
Speak to a licensed clinician from the comfort of your couch. With live video sessions on your phone, tablet, laptop, or desktop, Sanvello Therapy gives you the support (and flexibility) you need. Therapy includes access to a Sanvello Coach and premium self-care content, so you‚Äôll have a team and resources with you on your path to feeling better. Therapy is currently available in AZ, CA, CO, FL, IL, MA, MN, NJ, NY, NC, OH, PA, RI, TX, VA, and WA. Have a therapist you love already? They can use Sanvello for Clinicians to assign activities and see your progress. 

SUBSCRIPTION PRICING & TERMS: 
Sanvello is free to download and use. The premium version of Sanvello allows for unlimited use of all tools and is available through many major health plans (‚Äúupgrade via insurance‚Äù) or through an auto-renewing subscription. Payment will be charged to your Google Play account at confirmation of purchase. Your subscription will renew automatically unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the current period ends. Your Google Play account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period at the price listed above. You can turn off auto-renew at any time from your Google account settings but refunds will not be provided for the unused portion of the term. If a free trial period is offered, it will be forfeited as soon as your purchase is confirmed. 

Terms of Service: https://sanvello.com/tos/    

Privacy Policy: https://sanvello.com/privacy-policy/  
 
Help: https://help.sanvello.com or info@sanvello.com

comments: Easy to use and there's a lot to explore. I wish that the web version had more functionality like the app, and that everything would sync in between the two. It would be easier to do the thought/journal exercises on my computer rather than in the mobile app. It would be nice to have everything available in both web and mobile app.

Wonderfully calm and resourceful! I see a therapist regularly but have found Sanvello to help me in the in-between times. So far love the meditations and articles on the home page. Only thing is I wish I could change the order and content of the tiles on the home page. This might just be a feature I have yet to discover as most things seem to be easy to customize.

I would say this app really helps with stress and puts your mind at ease. They continuesly say that your bad feelings will not last for ever and for me that gives me some kind of validation. I also think this app really focuses on meditation and throughout the meditation you can really just try to let go and connect with yourself. This is my first day on this app but I went on it because I felt anxious and now I just feel relaxed.

I'm definitely a fan of this app! It doesn't block a ton of features so premium isn't super necessary, which is helpful to a teen like me, I love the community features and the personal hope board as well as the mood tracking, it's all very nice and definitely helpful

Sanvello came to me at the right time. I was under tremendous stress and not knowing where to turn. My employer told me about Sanvello and decided to try it. I love that there are so many resources in one app. It's simple to use and it keeps me motivated to stay on top of my feelings and manage my environment.

title: MedCircle
description:
Understand the mental health conditions that matter to you. Access the world‚Äôs greatest minds in mental health through engaging, interview-style video series, and other in-depth content.

 

With new content released each week, MedCircle‚Äôs award-winning video library gives you ‚Äúbehind-the-scenes‚Äù insight from the most sought-after psychologists and psychiatrists. You‚Äôll learn what certain diagnoses entail and get unprecedented insight into the processes that experienced doctors use to diagnose them. You‚Äôll also understand treatment options, the risks, and benefits each doctor considers when prescribing, and how they go about providing therapy and/or medication. 

 

Features: 

 

Access in-depth video series on the following mental health topics: 
addiction
obsessive-compulsive disorder (OCD) and hoarding disorder
personality disorders such as borderline personality disorder (BPD), antisocial personality disorder (ASPD), narcissistic personality disorder (NPD), schizotypal personality disorder (STPD), schizoid personality disorder (SPD), paranoid personality disorder (PPD), avoidant personality disorder (APD), obsessive-compulsive personality disorder (OCPD), dependent personality disorder (DPD), and histrionic personality disorder (HPD)
schizophrenia & psychotic disorders
trauma & post-traumatic stress disorder (PTSD)
treatments and therapies such as cognitive behavioral therapy (CBT), dialectical behavior therapy (DBT), acceptance and commitment therapy (ACT), somatic experiencing therapy (SE), electroconvulsive therapy (ECT), hypnotherapy, and more. 
Relationship issues
Mental health in children
Family mental health

Access in-depth video series featuring patients with lived experiences on a variety of mental health conditions in order to get a firsthand look at what it‚Äôs like to navigate certain disorders 

Get the insight you need to better navigate the mental health care system, and even better navigate your relationship with your mental health provider

Discover the strategies and tools you need to better take care of yourself, your family, and those you support in the short- and long-term

Stream from your computer, tablet, or phone anytime 

Customize your viewing experience to include only the topics you would like to learn about


Access the entire video library by upgrading to an All-Access membership. 

To access all features and content you can subscribe to MedCircle on a monthly or yearly basis with an auto-renewing subscription right inside the app.* Pricing can vary by region and will be confirmed before purchase in the app. In app subscriptions will automatically renew at the end of their cycle.

* All payments will be paid through your Google Account and may be managed under Account Settings after the initial payment. Subscription payments will automatically renew unless deactivated at least 24-hours before the end of the current cycle. Your account will be charged for renewal at least 24-hours prior to the end of the current cycle. Any unused portion of your free trial will be forfeited upon payment. Cancellations are incurred by disabling auto-renewal.

Terms of Service: https://www.medcircle.com/tos
Privacy Policy: https://www.medcircle.com/privacy

Access in-depth video series on the following mental health topics:
addiction
obsessive-compulsive disorder (OCD) and hoarding disorder
personality disorders such as borderline personality disorder (BPD), antisocial personality disorder (ASPD), narcissistic personality disorder (NPD), schizotypal personality disorder (STPD), schizoid personality disorder (SPD), paranoid personality disorder (PPD), avoidant personality disorder (APD), obsessive-compulsive personality disorder (OCPD), dependent personality disorder (DPD), and histrionic personality disorder (HPD)
schizophrenia & psychotic disorders
trauma & post-traumatic stress disorder (PTSD)
treatments and therapies such as cognitive behavioral therapy (CBT), dialectical behavior therapy (DBT), acceptance and commitment therapy (ACT), somatic experiencing therapy (SE), electroconvulsive therapy (ECT), hypnotherapy, and more.
Relationship issues
Mental health in children
Family mental health

Access in-depth video series featuring patients with lived experiences on a variety of mental health conditions in order to get a firsthand look at what it‚Äôs like to navigate certain disorders

Get the insight you need to better navigate the mental health care system, and even better navigate your relationship with your mental health provider

Discover the strategies and tools you need to better take care of yourself, your family, and those you support in the short- and long-term

Stream from your computer, tablet, or phone anytime

Customize your viewing experience to include only the topics you would like to learn about


Access the entire video library by upgrading to an All-Access membership.

To access all features and content you can subscribe to MedCircle on a monthly or yearly basis with an auto-renewing subscription right inside the app.* Pricing can vary by region and will be confirmed before purchase in the app. In app subscriptions will automatically renew at the end of their cycle.

* All payments will be paid through your Google Account and may be managed under Account Settings after the initial payment. Subscription payments will automatically renew unless deactivated at least 24-hours before the end of the current cycle. Your account will be charged for renewal at least 24-hours prior to the end of the current cycle. Any unused portion of your free trial will be forfeited upon payment. Cancellations are incurred by disabling auto-renewal.

Terms of Service: https://www.medcircle.com/tos
Privacy Policy: https://www.medcircle.com/privacy

developerAddress: PO Box 5000 - PMB 515 Rancho Santa Fe, Ca. 92067

comments: MedCircle is an amazing organization all by itself and that fact that they have brought there extraordinarily informative videos to this easy to use app format is absolutely incredible. I have had the app for weeks and use it regularly even downloading some videos to listen to while on my camping trip and everything has worked seamlessly. Thank you for your dedication to helping educate those of us who can't necessarily afford to see a mental health provider.

Overall, the MedCircle content is excellent. With regard to the app, it's a must download. Love how easy it is to find particular videos and then I can stream them to my Google home or television. Definitely makes the videos more accessible.
Informative, enlighting and useful and educational.
Very lovely and informative. This has helped me immensely become more educated on my own conditions as well as the conditions of people around me. Worth the money.

This is a very useful source of information for related to psychology and health, whether it be mental, emotional or physical. This has helped me answer some questions of my own and helped me start to take the next steps in fixing my problems. Plus watching their interviews let's me know that I am not alone!

title: Anxiety Tracker - Stress and Anxiety Log
description:
Anxiety Tracker
Track, analyze and manage your anxiety levels with this integrated mental health utility application. If you suffer from Generalized anxiety disorder, social anxiety, stress, or any other anxiety disorder, or if you're prone to frequent panic attacks or anxiety attacks, Anxiety Tracker can help you gain more insight into your mental health and daily mood, stress, and happiness.

Anxiety Levels
Anxiety tracker allows you to complete daily anxiety check-ins using the GAD-7 test to keep a record of your daily anxiety level and mood. This uses a score out of 21 calculated by the test, allowing you to visualize changes in your mood and feelings of anxiety. 

Panic Attacks
If you're having a panic attack or anxiety attack, log your symptoms and take notes on how you were feeling during, and leading up to the attack, as well as note any potential triggers for the attack. This will help you to predict and prepare for panic attacks in the future by becoming more aware of feelings of stress, depression, or anxiety before the attack happens, while allowing you to avoid potential triggers!

Positivity Journal
Log positive events for your mental health, with the free positivity journal feature! Gratitude Journaling can help you appreciate the positive experiences in your life and has proven benefits for mental health.

Analysis
Use Anxiety Tracker's comprehensive analysis page to analyse your anxiety, gratitude, panic attack, and medication data, then use this analysis to better manage your mental health over time.


Features

- Log daily check ins using the GAD-7 standardized anxiety test to create a baseline of your anxiety levels, and mood over time.

- Log anxiety attacks / panic attacks and measure the prevalence of panic attack symptoms such as pounding heart, sweating, trembling, shortness of breath, choking feelings, chest pain, nausea, dizziness and more.

- Free gratitude journal feature so you can track the positive experiences in your life as well. Try out the positivity journal today!

- Basic free data analytics: most common anxiety level, avg anxiety level, # anxiety attacks, # daily check ins.

- Customizable notification reminders, so you don't miss a check in.

- Premium Medication tracking: Track any medications that you take, and combine this data with your anxiety and panic attack data in our comprehensive analysis.

- Premium Anxiety Analysis: Get the most out of Anxiety Tracker with the premium anxiety analysis, which offers beautiful visual representations of anxiety levels, common symptoms, attack frequency and time of day, customizable history and more!


Why track your anxiety levels?

Mental health issues like anxiety disorders, panic attacks and depression affect many people around the world so it's important to keep track of your day to day mood and anxiety levels. 

By logging your anxiety symptoms and panic attacks you can feel more in control of your symptoms, learn more about how anxiety affects you personally, and ease the burden of generalized anxiety disorder, stress, depression and other mental health issues that can affect your long term and day to day happiness.


Disclaimer

The material provided in this app is not meant to replace or substitute the recommendations or advice of your physician or health care provider. The information contained in this app should not be used for diagnosing or treating a health problem or disease. If you believe you have a medical condition or problem contact your health care provider.

summary: Improve your mental health by tracking panic attacks, stress, and anxiety levels
developerAddress: 207 West Hastings St, Suite 805
recentChanges: + Visual redesign
comments: Bit rubbish really, Anxiety is new and I'm struggling terribly. I'm trying to figure out triggers and I find writing a daily log helps. But! This app has no tracker or graph as standard, they want you to pay. Even samsung health comes with free tracker for steps etc. I need a visual to help me assess and so this app and every other Anxiety app I've tried fail as nobody does the tracker for free.

On first glance this looks like the app I want, and I look forward to the full export abilities, per someone else's review. Two things: I'd love to be able to set multiple reminders per day, and I while I can't afford a subscription, I would pay a one-time payment to get rid of ads.
I definitely plan to get the premium version of this, within hopes that when I do get a therapist, that this app can help see what goes on daily.
I absolutely love the anxiety tracker and the reminders!!
I got an anxiety attack from your advertisements, bad app, uninstalled.

title: 7 Cups: Anxiety & Stress Chat
description:
Feeling worried, sad, stressed or lonely? Need to talk to someone? Download 7 Cups now for FREE anonymous emotional support & counseling from trained active listeners. Easy to use text chat. Real listeners available for you 24/7 & that‚Äôs not all:

- Chat 1-1 with a listener any time
- Calm yourself with 300 free mindfulness exercises
- Get personalized care with our free wellness test
- Boost your mood with simple activities
- Learn & grow from short videos 
- Feel supported in chat rooms & community forums
- Access online message therapy with licensed therapists
 
We start you on a ‚Äúgrowth path‚Äù that will encourage and support you as you take daily steps to become stronger.

Thousands of people use 7 Cups every week.

EMOTIONAL SUPPORT ON DEMAND:

Feeling stressed, anxious, or depressed? Having relationship problems? Sometimes you need to vent. Finding and scheduling a therapist can be time-consuming and expensive, and you can‚Äôt always open up to friends, family, or coworkers.

Now you can get emotional support anytime, anywhere with 7 Cups. This app gives you the help you need, fast and free, in a way that fits your life.

‚Ä¢ Connect anytime, anywhere with listeners who care
‚Ä¢ Speak your mind without any fear of being judged
‚Ä¢ All listeners trained in active listening

IN THE MEDIA:

Founded by a licensed psychologist, 7 Cups has been featured in LifeHacker (‚ÄúTechnology can help you find someone to chat with about your problems to, or even connect you with a professional that can offer lasting, long-term help‚Äù), Medical Daily (‚ÄúTalking therapy for people on-the-go‚Äù), and TechCrunch (‚ÄúOne of the top 8 startups from Y Combinator‚Äôs Summer ‚Äô13 Demo Day‚Äù).

100% CONFIDENTIAL:

Remain 100% anonymous. No one will ever know who you are‚Äînot even your listeners or therapists.

LISTENERS WHO CARE:

Our listeners are volunteers. They aren‚Äôt getting paid; they‚Äôre here because they want to help.

They care.

We have over 160,000 trained listeners and licensed therapists to choose from. Listeners provide support across 189 countries and in 140 languages. Each listener has a profile with reviews and a list of categories that they specialize in, ranging from panic attacks and bullying to eating disorders, surviving a breakup, and more.

When you find the listener you want, connect instantly via chat. Try a new listener each time, or pick one listener and develop a deeper ongoing relationship.

FAST & FREE:

The app is free to download, and all listeners are 100% free. After you download the app, you can start a conversation in less than 60 seconds.

UPGRADE PRICING & TERMS

7 Cups offers two auto-renewing subscription options:
$12.99/month
$94.99/year

Your 7 Cups upgrade will automatically renew at the end of each term and your credit card will be charged through your iTunes account. You can turn off auto-renew at any time from your iTunes account settings but refunds will not be provided for any unused portion of the term.

7 Cups also offers a Forever subscription paid for in a single non-renewing upfront payment of $399.99 granting unlimited access to 7 Cups Upgrade forever.

Read more about our terms and conditions here:

Read more about our terms of service and privacy policy here:
http://www.7cups.com/privacy.php

Download 7 Cups and start feeling better today!

If you love 7 Cups, please take 20 seconds to give us a nice review. It really helps! For other feedback, contact info@7cups.com. Thank you.

For users aged 13+.

comments: Hey 7 Cups Team! I really like the idea of your network. But this app definitely needs improvements. I am visual impaired so I had my phones font size in a large level... which wasn't possible with this app. I couldn't open a chat or other things. I tried to use it with TalkBack then, which didn't work as well. Please improve the app and make it more accessible. Thanks!

Great concept but needs improvement. The chat function is glitchy, and there's more functionality on the website than the app. I really wanted to use this app and might change my review if the bugs are fixed. The initial bot chat interface bounces around back to the top and gives error messages. Was not able to take some sort of evaluation because of it. I thought the monthly subscription was for talking with a therapist. But that's another $150.

notifies whenever someone like a listener says something to you, it's more faster to access than on your computer, and it's pretty good overall :) all of the features aren't on there like on a computer but it still provides you with the important things like the communities, forums, and chats with people! i was surprised with how supportive and friendly <3 the people are on here that listens to what you have to say and you can help out people by becomimg a listener which can make you feel good!

Very Helpful! I was pleasantly surprised with how much this app assisted me in a time of great stress and frustration. My only complaint was that the chat was extremely glitchy when I tried to scroll up and read the older messages above, it wouldn't let me at times. Hopefully they can fix the chat glitches to make it more user friendly, because then it would be perfect.

I would love to give this app 5 stars but I can't. It's just that whenever I feel down, I go chat with the bot but the app glitches so much that I can't even read the messages. One time we are discussing something new but then it glitches out and it puts me onto an older part of our conversation. I- I just don't know what to do. I know it was not intentional, but still. Please fix this. 7 Cups has a lot of potential and I would be sad if it was all wasted.

title: Psychiatry Pro-Diagnosis,Info,Treatment,CBT & DBT
description:
Psychiatry PRO-Project Reach Out is a free Mental Health App that is akin to having your own Personal Psychiatrist & Psychotherapist all rolled up into one and available to you anywhere anytime.Mental health,wellness & well-being made easy & free.

Based on simple questions it can test for Diagnose Mental Health Disorders and then give information about Diseases & Treatment options Pharmacotherapy,Psychotherapy & then also offers Interactive Disorder specific detailed Self-help CBT courses. 

Our Comprehensive App currently offers:-
Diagnostic test of Mental Disorders 
Information 
Psychotherapy-Cognitive Behavior Therapy 
Dialectic Behavior Therapy
Mood & Thought Record Diary 
Suicide Prevention 
Personal Development  
Alcohol Addiction Counselling 
Substance Abuse Counselling 
Quote of the day
Chat
Forums
Anonymous posts
Bibliotherapy 
Nutritional information  

1.Diagnosis
Screening Psychiatric Interview Tests based upon the Diagnostic & Statistical Manual of Mental Disorders (DSM-5) similar to a real-world Psychiatric Assessment. This Comprehensive Diagnostic Screening tool currently tests disorders such as Depression,Anxiety disorders,Panic Attacks,Social Anxiety, Phobias, Obsessive Compulsive Disorder (OCD),Post traumatic Stress Disorder (PTSD),Body dysmorphia,Eating disorders,Anorexia & Bulimia nervosa, Binging & Purging,Bipolar disorder including Mania & Hypomania,Schizophrenia & Psychosis, Insomnia,Self harm & Suicidality,Borderline or Emotionally Unstable Personality disorder & Antisocial Personality Disorder,Alcohol Addiction & Substance Abuse etc

2.Information 
The App provides a Library of Professional level Information about  Prevalence,Incidence,Pathogenesis,Prognosis & Treatment of Psychiatric Disorders.Knowledge and awareness instill a less negative approach to mental health problems and improves Treatment Outcomes..

3.Psychotherapy 
What you think is,what you feel is,what you do! Thus changing thoughts and behaviors can change how a person is feeling which is basically what Cognitive Behavior Therapy or CBT is,a Talk therapy clinically proven to work & widely used in clinical practice.App also included DBT Dialectical Behavior Therapy specific for Borderline Personality Disorder.

4.Mood & Thought Record Diary 
App includes a Mood & Thought Record Diary which are essentially parts of CBT & help in recognizing Negative Automatic Thoughts and then subsequently changing theses & core-beliefs,behaviors and feelings in-turn.

5.Suicide Prevention 
There is a separate Suicide Prevention section with a worldwide phone and website directory and modules such as distress tolerance and suicide safety planning.

6.Personal Development
CBT based Wellness & Personal Development section with Interactive Self-help Programs based on Cognitive Behavior Therapy with Worksheets and exercises to boost mental health and well-being. This covers topics such as Procrastination, Anger Management, Self-Esteem, Assertiveness, Self-love, Perfectionism and Mindfulness.

7.Alcohol and Substance Abuse Addiction Counselling 
The app includes addiction counselling materials based on CBT Principles and can help users overcome problems with addiction to alcohol or other substances such as illicit drugs.

8.Quote of the day,Chat,Forums,Anonymous posts,Bibliotherapy & Nutrition 
The app includes Features such as Anonymous Problem Posting, Quote of the day,Chat-rooms, Forums,Nutrition & Supplements information,Books to read,Motivational Articles are included.

9.Video e-CBT -Work in progress
Our Trained CBT Therapist is currently working on a Video Series ,which is first of its kind E-CBT series.The videos will be emulating real life Clinical Psychotherapy sessions.

10.Future features-Work in progress  
Team plans to implement One-on-one Video/Audio Psychiatric Consultation with a Psychiatrist, One-on-one Video Psychotherapy sessions & Group Audio Support Sessions With Our Trained CBT Therapist, Psychotherapist & Life-Coach in the near future..

comments: This is an incredible app. I am excited. I often get distressed and use a psychologist's service. Now that I am using this app, I go to my psichologist seldomly. There is so much info in this. It also works great in my phone. Nice
The tests help me understand what people with such mental issues may face, which is interesting. The UI can do with an improvement. I can't read the notice if it is shaking violently!
Great app. Simple and pleasant interface. Clear and convenient functionality. I liked giving you a top five.

Very useful tool for diagnosis and treatment options. User friendly. Clear outline of diagnoses and useful information within each section. Informative for user without an information overload. Good for non medical and medical users. Will recommend to colleagues and patients as an information tool
This is a great and unique app. Easy to use liked the UI. Does anything you would except and more. Recommended.

title: OCD App - Obsessive Corbuzier's Diet (OFFICIAL)
description:
(OCD) Obsessive Corbuzier's Diet merupakan program diet yang dikenalkan oleh Deddy Corbuzier, Diet OCD bisa menurunkan berat badan hingga empat kilogram lebih dalam seminggu.

Kita ketahui program diet umumnya atau biasanya mengharuskan kita untuk mengurangi makan nasi putih atau gorengan, akan tetapi khusus OCD bebas makan apa saja. Anda juga tidak perlu mengubah asupan makan ketika melakukan diet OCD. Anda boleh makan apa pun termasuk makanan berlemak sesuai selera. Akan tetapi, tetap disarankan agar tidak rakus.

Diet OCD akan memangkas timbunan lemak serta bisa menurunkan berat badan Anda dengan cepat, OCD menjamin dapat membuat berat badan turun sampai 5 kg lebih.
Untuk mendapatkan hasil tersebut, Anda perlu mengikuti intruksi-instruksi yang disarankan, seperti 'jendela makan' Jendela makan adalah waktu Anda bisa menyantap makanan.

Bagi Anda yang tertarik untuk mengikuti program diet OCD, Aplikasi OCD App ini ada untuk membantu Anda, bagi yang belum mengenal lebih dalam tetang OCD, tenang saja, didalam aplikasi sudah tersedia juga informasi lengkap tengan diet OCD ini, fitur-fitur pendukung diet OCD pun sudah tersedia, seperti Gerakan O7W yang tentunya sangat efektif untuk menggoncangkan berat badan anda.

Diet OCD sangat direkomendasikan oleh banyak orang, tentunya Aplikasi ini spesial untuk Anda yang ingin mendapatkan tubuh ideal.

Diet OCD sangat direkomendasikan oleh banyak orang, tentunya Aplikasi ini spesial untuk Anda yang ingin mendapatkan tubuh ideal.

title: WorryTree: Anxiety Relief - CBT Self-Help Tool
description:
Identify your worries, anxiety and negative thoughts, take action and transform your thinking so you feel calmer and less anxious. WorryTree helps you do all of this based on established Cognitive Behavioural Therapy (CBT) techniques. 

*Now featured on the NHS Digital App Library*

"This is the best app honestly for anxiety or obsessive thinking. It's very simple and has a calm design and gives the user a feeling of empowerment in their life." 

We've created a very simple, easy to use and practical app that will support you through the problem-solving process helping you either to make a plan to deal with your worry, or find in-the-moment distractions to help you cope.

WorryTree is for you if: 

- You're looking for a simple, practical and easy to use app to manage your worry, panic and anxiety 
- You want to be able to make a plan for dealing with a situation you're worrying or feeling stressed about
- You struggle to remember what helps you to feel calm when you're feeling anxious
- You're committed to changing your thought habits for the benefit of your mental health

WorryTree is not: 

- A substitute for professional mental health care
- A complex app with lots of layers and clever algorithms - we've designed it to be very simple so that it's easy to use when you're feeling anxious or panicky
- A magician - Real habit change will only happen if you commit to regularly catching, recording and problem solving your worries, but we'll do our best to support you  
- Built by a faceless app development company - we're a family-run UK business created by anxiety sufferers with a genuine wish to help others who struggle with worry
- Just an app - we're building a supportive community for users and via our blog too

"This app is so simple, wonderful and functional at the same time. When I am worrying about something, I just write it on this app, and then I feel much better."

**If you love WorryTree then you'll love subscribing to WorryTree Plus too!** 

WorryTree Plus brings all of the basic features of WorryTree, plus some extras too! Use our uncertainty tool to work through any uncertainties that you're struggling with, go back and review your worries after the event, consider your negative thinking styles and add your action plans to your own calendar. You can even now use WorryTree as a Gratitude Journal! 

Your subscription to WorryTree Plus enables us to keep the basic version of WorryTree free forever for people who can't afford to pay. It also allows us to invest more money into improving WorryTree for all of our users and to keep our app advertising free, so it's always this simple to use. 

After you choose either our monthly or annual subscription plan and confirm your purchase, the payment will be charged to your credit or debit card via your Google Play Account. Once purchased, subscriptions will automatically renew unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period.

You can read our Terms and Conditions in full at https://worry-tree.com/terms-conditions. 

**WorryTree is not a substitute for professional mental health care, therapy or advice. If you're worried about any aspect of your mental health, or someone else's, you should always approach a professional.**
