We hope you'll love Calorie Counter by FatSecret. We are constantly working to improve the app and welcome user feedback.

comments: I use this every single day. It's helped me achieve a much healthier and balanced lifestyle. I use it mainly for the calorie tracker. However, the estimation for calorie expenditure is nuts. I'm a 30yo male, 5'8", 230lbs, wanting to "lose weight fast" was given a target goal of 2500 calories per day. This is to lose weight "fast". Not maintain it. Do not use the feature in the app/website. Best do a quick calculation over at any google search you find for "TDEE" total daily energy expenditure

Makes it so easy to be aware of our daily calorie intake, and also the cumulated nutritional values (!) of the food we eat during the day. Possibility to make custom recipes which will then be counted and added to the meals according to portion size. Seriously, this app is awesome! So simple, but so great ..it can save you a ton of time if you're just starting out to eat consciously.

This app is very useful for keeping track of calories consumed throughout the day with its food journal. The foods are searchable by brand, variety, etcetera. The app is able to calculate how many calories one needs to consume to lose, gain, or maintain body weight according to current weight, weight loss goal, and activity level. I have seen results on the scale by using this app as a tool to help reach my goal.

Great app. I first downloaded MyfitnessPal app and it was a hard app to get used to and was riddled in ads and asking you to sign up to premium. I then found this one and I was used to it within a day of using it. Its very easy to operate. Only thing is, I find it doesn't recognize alot of barcodes and food you type in.

Works very well. Easy to use once u get the hang of it. I only wish it could track some other things like BP and take pill reminders. The people behind this have been very responsive with help and questions. I reccomend using this if you want to get a good evaluation of you food habits with the caveot....ya gotta be honestbwith you entries. 'Nuff sed.

title: Calorie Counter - MyFitnessPal
description:
Whether you want to lose weight, tone up, get healthy, change your habits, or start a new diet MyFitnessPal has you covered. Our members have lost over 200 million pounds and 88% of people who track for at least 7 days on MyFitnessPal lose weight. Sign up for FREE and start living a happier and healthier life today!

See for yourself why MyFitnessPal is the world‚Äôs most popular health and fitness app.

‚ñåTRACKING FOOD IS FAST AND EASY 
‚ñ† Biggest Food Database -- 11+ million foods in our database including global items and cuisines. 
‚ñ† Barcode Scanner -- Simply scan barcodes to log foods. 4+ million barcodes recognized. 
‚ñ† Recipe Importer -- Easily import the nutrition information for the recipes you cook.
‚ñ† Restaurant Logging -- Quickly log menu items from your favorite restaurants.
‚ñ† Food Insights -- Learn how to make healthier choices about the foods you eat. 
‚ñ† Personalized Experience -- Create your own foods, recipes, and meals and save favorites. 
‚ñ† Calorie Counter -- We automatically calculate the calories in your foods, meals and recipes.
‚ñ† Macro Tracker -- We automatically calculate the macros (carbs, fat, protein) in your foods, meals and recipes.
‚ñ† Track All Nutrients -- Calories, macros (carbs, fat, protein), sugar, fiber, cholesterol, vitamins, and more.
‚ñ† Customize Your Diary -- Log breakfast, lunch, dinner and snacks or create your own meals. 
‚ñ† Water Tracking -- Log water in cups, ounces or ml. We save your recently logged amounts.

‚ñåREACH YOUR GOALS
‚ñ† Choose A Goal -- We support weight loss, weight gain, and weight maintenance goals.  
‚ñ† Goal Setting -- Create your own goals or let us create personalized goals for you, including calorie and macros goals.
‚ñ† Change Habits -- It's almost like having a nutrition coach right inside your pocket.

‚ñåLOG YOUR EXERCISE AND STEPS 
‚ñ† Connect 50+ Apps & Devices -- Syncing your workouts is easy and automatic.
‚ñ† Choose From 350+ Exercises -- Or create your own exercises and workouts. 
‚ñ† Log Cardio Exercises -- Including running, walking, biking, swimming, yoga, pilates and more. 
‚ñ† Log Strength Exercises -- Including sets, reps, and weight per set. 
‚ñ† Track Steps -- Set a daily step goal and see a graph of your step history. 
‚ñ† We connect with all your favorite apps and devices -- Including Fitbit, Jawbone UP, Garmin, MapMyFitness, Runkeeper, Strava, Runtastic, Misfit, Withings, HealthKit, UA Record and many more!

‚ñåGET SUPPORT AND MOTIVATION 
‚ñ† Add Friends -- Connect with friends for an extra layer of support and accountability.
‚ñ† Join Our Community -- Find motivation, support, tips, and advice in our active forums. 
‚ñ† Newsfeed Updates -- Share your accomplishments and see friend‚Äôs progress in the newsfeed.

‚ñåCELEBRATE YOUR SUCCESS 
‚ñ† Chart Your Progress -- Stay motivated with a graph of how you‚Äôre improving over time.
‚ñ† Progress Photos -- Add photos to your weight entries to see and celebrate your progress. 
‚ñ† Nutrition Reports -- View a history of your calories, macros, and nutrient intake. 
‚ñ† Share Your Progress -- Help inspire friends and family members on their own health journey.

Download MyFitnessPal and start living a happier and healthier life today!

For our full terms and conditions and our privacy policy, please visit: https://account.underarmour.com/privacy?locale=en

comments: The step synching with Samsung Health has stopped working. I thought it was a problem with my phone initially, but as my food entries were synching I realise it's a MFP issue and not the first time. So annoying! 16/10/20 One week later and still not working. What's going on? 29/10/20 Still not synching with Samsung Health. Why is it taking so long? 31/10/20 The new release is not working properly at all, it only syncs a fraction of the total number of steps taken. Just awful!

**UPDATE: I have been using the app since last July 2019. It's a great tool. I have lost 70 lbs. on the keto diet since then, I couldn't have been so successful without it! Helps keep me on track with my goals. **Step tracker is fixed! Thank you! I will say that it was a little frustrating getting an email(actually several) that said my problem was resolved, when it wasn't... their internal term for "yes, we know it's a problem and we're working on it" But it's fixed now, I am happy. !

When it works it helps keep me motivated, and there's a great database. However it wants to know why I haven't logged lunch at 8:10 AM (and yes my settings are on the correct time zone). It locks up often, failing to allow me to add goods in a timely manner. If the glitches don't improve I'll try a different app.

Downloaded the app on the recommendation of my trainer and am finding it very useful. The only frustrating part is trying to find certain foods when tracking meals. There is almost too much choice which makes it frustrating to have to scroll through a massive list if what is typed in doesn't match exactly. Other than that this app has been great. Still debating whether to pay for the premium features but only because I'm cheap.

It used to be amazing. Now, it's riddled with premium forced on you and location tracking prompts that don't stop with no way to say 'never show again.' it's not longer simple to use. Update: the intrusive ads are rediculous. You should not get an ad when you hit ad food, or other important actions. They are put in places to seemingly trick you into clicking them - they often appear just as you are going to naturally push a button.

title: Match 3D - Matching Puzzle Game
description:
Get ready for a new,original, challenging matching pairs game.
You need to Match 3D objects on the ground and pop them all ! When you clear a level, you will find new objects to pair.

Match 3D is easy to play for everyone !

Polished pairs of animals, foods, school objects, house properties, emoji's and much more to satisfying levels to pass with just onet the cards!

This free game will power up your brain and increase your memory speed since it offer tons of sweet and cute combinations.  

All you need to do is playing this connection based game with various 3D levels that separate it from all other games. It is a matching pair game that is so easy that everyone can play it.

Features;
Polished 3D visual effects and objects.
Well-designed brain trainer levels.
Pause it whenever you want.
Auto-save game to continue from your last save anytime.
Cute animals, sweet yummy foods, cool toys, exciting emoji's and much more stuff to puzzle it out.

recentChanges: Minor Bug Fix
comments: The game is great. My problem is that I had a glitch where I couldn't complete a game.I matched everything but no win. I sent a message and told them and mentioned that I lost 300 coins playing this game 3 times. They fixed it, but I guess they don't reimburse for their glitches. 2nd thing, now they have a survey going. 200 coins. I could use it. Takes 15 minutes. It finally says thanks you you now have the 200 coins. Well I didn't get it. Tried again. No coins. Asked for help twice. Nada

Love this game, however since yesterday on every game I play, once I've cleared the board completely I have to use one of my help options to end the round. Not sure if this is a glitch or what. I hope this gets fixed, or I will need to stop playing and delete. I am updating my review, the previous has been fixed and now my game back to working as normal. I really appreciate the fast turnaround on this. Other than that, this game is fun, and relaxing... love it.

It is fun, some stages more challenging than others. Sometimes items get stuck and you need to use a cheat to get them quick enough not to lose your bonus. Only thing is, there's a piggy bank that's full that you can't use for anything but you can unlock a bigger piggy bank but why??? There's no purpose to it??? I would love the ability to do a shared board with a friend.

I like the game but like others I have issues: 1) ads which can't be muted. I don't care for the political ads, wish to mute. 2) Items on the sides being hard to grasp, agree. I started using a stylus. Easier. 3) I still have no idea what the coins are for as most things in the game cost money, not coins; I'm not sure why the amount of coins reset either, what's the point? I haven't reached the level some have mentioned where there are "ghost" pieces though. That'll likely change my rating.

Originally I gave this game 5 stars. I have cancelled that because I now only get times in the 5 minute range. Gets very boring now. Same time continually. What happened? Also agree about too many adds. Not enough time given to actually playing the game. More time spent waiting for ads to go by. I never watch them. Fixed the 'same time' problem. Deleted game for a while. Then downloaded it again. Did this a couple of times until the times changed. OK for now anyway. Problem Ads the same.

title: Looper!
description:
Take a trip through Looper - a joyous, melodious casual game that puts your sense of rhythm and timing to the test.

Every tap starts a colourful new beat that travels along increasingly complex constellations - get your timing wrong and the beats could crash and burn. Get it right, however, and experience the simple satisfaction of looping harmony.

Featuring hundreds of unique levels, each designed to sooth and satisfy your puzzling needs. Looper is a music puzzle game like no other.


SUBSCRIBE TO LOOPER!
 
Subscribe to Looper! for all of the following benefits:
* 3 NEW beat skins to use in the game
* 3 NEW Exclusive audio tracks
* ALL Levels unlocked, PLUS, 20 special levels 
* FREE solution hints for ALL levels
* The Remove Ads product, which removes non-optional adverts from the game
 
SUBSCRIPTIONS INFORMATION:
 
Looper! VIP Membership access offers two membership options:

1) A weekly subscription costing $5.49 per week after a 3 day FREE trial period.

2) A monthly subscription costing $14.49 per month.

After buying this subscription, 3 new beat skins to use in the game, 3 new and exclusive audio tracks, all levels unlocked, plus, 20 special levels you will be able to play in the game, free solution hints for all levels and you will unlock and remove non-optional ads product, which removes non-optional adverts from the game. This is an auto-renewable subscription. The payment is charged to your account after confirmation. The subscription is renewed unless you unsubscribe 24 hours before the period ends. Your account will also be charged for renewal
The prices notes are for United States customers. Pricing in other countries may change and actual charges may be converted to local currency.
End of trial and subscription renewal:
- The payment is charged to your iTunes account after a confirmation of purchase
- The subscription is renewed unless you unsubscribe 24 hours before the end of the current period
- The account will be charged for renewal 24 hours before the end of the current period at the standard cost of the weekly subscription
- The user may manage the subscription and auto-renewal by accessing the user's account settings after purchase in the store
- No cancellation of the current subscription is permitted during the active subscription period
- Any unused portion of the free trial period will be forfeited when the subscription is purchased
Cancelling a trial or subscription:
- In order to cancel a subscription during the free trial period you need to cancel it through your account in the Store. This must be done at least 24 hours before the end of the free trial period to avoid being charged.

recentChanges: + Keeping the beat alive with bug fixes and improvements
comments: Wow, this is a great game! Idk y people are saying it's bad and it lags. Well I can give some tips: Switch on airplane mode, it will stop and and prevent lag. Also whenever you are going to a new level, close the game open it again and press the next level. Do this for about 3-4 times and lag will reduce. I followed all these steps and now it's very smooth! Also you have to feel the beat in the game, and go accordingly. I mix sounds and audio, so I'm good at that. Great time killer and gr8 game!

This game used to be great, I hate to say this but now it is horrible! The game gets to about level 8 then on level 9 u get to the last part and guess what, it freezes! I tried redownloading it, restarting my phone, and going in and out of the game but nothing worked! Dont waste your time playing for 2 minutes, freezing then wasting more time trying to get it to work.

I love this and all and I love the app, but why 1 star? Well it is simple, I love this before, BUT then it all got laggy and stuff. And also, it freezes in your screen, sometimes even my phone would glitch and my phone is FREAKING BRAND NEW!! And so, I give it 1 star cause of that, sometimes it also stops popping out any balls. I keep clicking yet, nothing is coming out. So if you wanna play this, go a head, but I wouldn't so I am just deleting it. If the glitch and freezing isn't there, 5 star.

This is an amazing game, but what frustrates me a lot is the extreme lag i get whenever I open up the game and start playing a level. You may not get as much lag if you have a phone or tablet with VERY good connection.

The game is a really cool and fun concept but theres so many ads. Everytime you complete a level an ad pops up. I use to have this game and it use to run great little to no lag and it had a few ads but it wasnt constant.

title: Psychopedia
description:
Psychopedia is an application that helps the users to destigmatize mental health conditions and encourage users to seek the help they need.
Mental disorders could be a big issue for your health. Can be caused by lifestyle, stress, diseases, calories, drastic weight loss, family issues, body fitness, etc.
The tests in this app are one of the quickest ways to determine whether you are experiencing symptoms of a specific mental health condition.
In addition, there are helpful articles about mental health conditions, related subjects about relationships, about who you are and how your psyche works.
Take a test and learn more about yourself.

Description
Over 60 articles about mental health conditions, relationships and psychology.
And 30 Mental Health tests including:
‚òÖ Agoraphobia Test
‚òÖ Antisocial Personality Disorder (ASPD) Test
‚òÖ Anxiety Test
‚òÖ Autism Test
‚òÖ Binge Eating Disorder Test
‚òÖ Bipolar Disorder Test
‚òÖ Borderline Personality Disorder (BPD) Test
‚òÖ Child Autism Test

‚òÖ Domestic Violence Screening

comments: I like how every area of this app is straight forward; even the questionnaire is direct and effective. There are several different topics to explore. The results and advice are kept simple and to the point. Highly Recommended!
I have shared it with friends already. Great app. Retake tests, compares results to each one, keeps a journal. If you're just starting to seek medical help, it can be very helpful.
Nice app. Its really helpful and opens up a lot of things about how I am and how I can improve. Very well designed app. Tests are easy and quick.

title: Bipolar Disorder
description:
Getting to Know Bipolar Disorder Symptoms

Whenever someone in the family or a familiar person suddenly acts strange and the behavior can be associated with some kind of mental disorder, it is important that symptoms must be seen and accurately determined to be able to know the kinds of treatment for the disease.

Before claiming that someone really suffers from bipolar disorder, it is first important to identify the symptoms to strengthen the educated guess.

A sudden gush of excitement can‚Äôt be categorized as being bipolar. People have the right to be angry, happy, sad and all those behaviors. Although, when one experiences the disease, it will be most unlikely that the person will show a condition that had become tragically habitual. Typically, there are four episodes that a person will engage into if he or she suffers from the disorder. These episodes are:

1. Major Depressive Episode

Someone who is experiencing a major depressive episode in his or her life expresses symptoms like:

‚Ä¢ persistent emotional feelings of anxiety, anger, sadness, guilt, isolation and hopelessness ‚Ä¢ indifference, apathy or self-loathing ‚Ä¢ appetite and sleep disturbances ‚Ä¢ fatigue and extreme restlessness ‚Ä¢ unable to become interested in usually enjoyable activities ‚Ä¢ depersonalization and extreme loneliness ‚Ä¢ lack of interest in having sexual activities ‚Ä¢ social anxiety and shyness ‚Ä¢ chronic pain that usually triggers irritability ‚Ä¢ suicidal tendencies or morbid thinking

In worst case scenarios, most especially if the person suffering from the disorder never had the opportunity to go into psychological help, he can become psychotic which is also known as a severe condition of the disease.

2. Manic Episode

Major characteristics of people who experiences manic episodes are those that have a distinct condition of expansive, irritable or elevated mood state. Someone who suffers manic episodes experience a common insurmountable amount of energy but lacks the capability to get proper sleep.

Furthermore, the speech of the person is pressured in a way that even thoughts are racing. Attention span is decreased and can be easily distracted. Impairment of judgment can also be experienced whereas the sufferer will undergo sprees and abnormal behavior that is quite unusual on his or her part.

Indulging in substance abuse can also be possible. Substances may include depressant drugs, stimulants, and even sleeping pills. Behavior may range from being intrusive or aggressive. Grandiose and delusional ideas may become prominent. During extremes, a person may exhibit psychosis which is a factor that perceives fantasy more than reality.

3. Hypomanic Episode

This is the lesser part of mania episode. Extremes are less prominent. Symptoms and attitudes are also decreased. When a person experiences a hypomanic episode, he would feel sudden uncontrollable behavior like laughing out loud even with no specific reason behind it or there might be a reason but it would be shallow.

Duration of the episode occurs only for a short period of time. Oftentimes, this is associated with the artistic mind of the person involved because intelligent thinking, flight of ideas, and an abnormal increase in energy can be seen.

4. Mixed Episode

Mixed episodes usually refer to the combined state of depressive episodes and manic episodes that may occur simultaneously. Some of which are experiencing impulsiveness, racing thoughts, rage, agitation, paranoia, aggressiveness, etc.

It is better that one understands the different episodes a bipolar disorder expresses in order to diagnose the disease earlier and treatment can be performed.

title: Lose Belly Fat at Home - Lose Weight Flat Stomach
description:
Sweat just 10 minutes a day! Lose belly fat and flatten your tummy with our short and effective fat burning workouts at home! You will get a flat stomach in just a few weeks!

Belly fat covers your abs and harms your health. It can raise the risk of high blood pressure, cancer, and other diseases. Experts have pointed out that aerobic exercises help in burning calories and boosting the metabolism. Try the aerobic exercises in this app to get rid of the annoying belly fat and improve your health.

We have prepared systematic and scientifically-proven workout plans to help you lose belly fat and get a flatter stomach in a simple and fun way. No equipment or coach needed, you can easily do the belly workout at home or anywhere, anytime.

Why choose this workout app Lose Belly Fat?
- 100% free! No hidden charges!
- Quick and effective workouts maximize fat burning.
- Requires no equipment. Burn belly fat, lose weight and stay fit with just your body weight.
- Abs workout exercise with 3 difficulty levels (easy, medium, hard) designed by experts.
- Suitable for both beginner and pro.
- Beginner friendly.
- Animation and video guidance just like your personal workout trainer.
- Track your weight loss progress.
- Daily workout tracker to track burned calories.
- Customized workout reminders remind you to tone your stomach.
- Health tips help you develop a balanced diet for weight loss and good health.
- Stomach workouts, belly fat exercises, ab workouts, and core workout aimed to bring you a flat tummy and a good figure.
- Do these abs workout exercises 10 minutes a day to burn belly fat and achieve your goal of having a flat tummy.
- Sync data with Google Fit. 

Stop wasting your time with those useless methods. Download Lose Belly Fat for free and start working out at home to burn fat, tone your belly, lose weight and build muscle faster. You'll have beach-ready abs in no time!

Belly fat burning exercises 
Looking for belly fat exercise? Want to lose stomach fat quickly? This weight loss app helps you lose spare tire belly. It has the best workouts to lose weight at home.

Lose belly fat at home 
Take a few minutes a day to reduce belly fat with our stomach fat burning exercise. All Ab workouts are designed by the professional fitness coach.

Core workout
Keep fit and lose belly fat with fat burning exercises. This app not only has core workout for men, but also has core workout for women. All these body fat burning exercise can be done anywhere at any time. 

Female fitness exercise
With fat burning workouts for women, you can quickly belly fat loss and get 11 line abs. Just exercise at home to burn belly fat!

Weight loss exercises
Want to exercise to get a flat tummy? Please remember that the diet is important. You need to combine fat burning workouts with low calorie diet to maximize the workout results.

HIIT workouts
Burn calories with abs workout at home, and combine with HIIT workouts for women to get the results faster.

Fat burning workouts for men
Exercise at home with effective HIIT workouts for men to see great changes in a few weeks!

Fitness coach
All workouts are designed by professional fitness coach. Workout guide through the exercise, just like having a personal fitness coach in your pocket!

More features coming soon, such as sync data with Fitbit, Samsung Health, MyFitnessPal...

comments: Has a good variety of exercise routines for free. Ads aren't bad at all. I'm on month 3 and have lost 10 pounds and several inches. Glad I found this app!
Best exercise app yet, only one I've ever seen results from; you can create your own workout for free, Amazing.
Not great. I've been doing the beginner exercises for a month and don't see any reduction in my tummy size. But atleast I've started working out because of this app. Hence the 3 starts.
This is a great app. I love it. There are many options & it is user friendly.
It's really hard to find this app's equivalent. I am not even sure if one exists. Truly lovely. Kudos to the developers!

title: Home Workout - No Equipment
description:
Home Workouts provides daily workout routines for all your main muscle groups. In just a few minutes a day, you can build muscles and keep fitness at home without having to go to the gym. No equipment or coach needed, all exercises can be performed with just your body weight.

The app has workouts for your abs, chest, legs, arms and butt as well as full body workouts. All the workouts are designed by experts. None of them need equipment, so there's no need to go to the gym. Even though it just takes a few minutes a day, it can effectively tone your muscles and help you get six pack abs at home.

The warm-up and stretching routines are designed to make sure you exercise in a scientific way. With animations and video guidance for each exercise, you can make sure you use the right form during each exercise.

Stick with our home workouts, and you will notice a change in your body in just a few short weeks.

Features
*Warm-up and stretching routines
*Records training progress automatically
*The chart tracks your weight trends
*Customize your workout reminders
*Detailed video and animation guides
*Lose weight with a personal trainer

recentChanges: ‚Ä¢ Fix bug
comments: Surprisingly great app considering its free. I have only tested the "Full body" and "Lower body" challenges so far and they are great. The only complaints are: - Not enough stretching at the beginning and end of the training. - The "full body challenge" essentially targets the upper body. Would have like a program for the whole body, 3-5 days a week! Good job guys (and girls)!

Great in home workout! I have gotten a few new phones since using this though, and my progress doesn't come with me. For instance, I did the 30 day challenge a while back, but when I get a new phone the last parts of that circuit are locked unless I do it all again. That's my only knock. Been using this for a long time and really happy with the compressed, useful workouts.

I used many apps but I have to admit that this is the best work out app. Can you imagine that I built a muscular body out of this app. No heavyweights needed, just a set of instructions and guidance to follow. The app is well designed, with work out plans, a section where you add your weight and calculate your BMI, and a full report given to you after every exercise. On top of this, there are no ads to bother you and you can even use it offline. In a nutshell, this is an awesome app!

Voice guided, no intrusive ads, what more can I ask for? If you're not a beginner and know the "theories" of working out, this is useful. I seriously doubt the "intermediate" chest workout could be done perfectly by even an "advanced" person, as the rest intervals are waaaay too low.

Tried doing the upper body and lower body routine 28 day challenge, and it was a great experience. The first 3 days all of my body was sore (haven't worked out in months). It targets certain parts of your body every day and gets more intense as days pass. Even has descriptions, gifs, and video examples in case there's confusion. I learned alot of different stretches and workouts to add to my own custom routine. And this was only 1 part of the app. Also the ads are so unintrusive!

title: Essential Oils & More
description:
Essential Oils & More is a free comprehensive guide for learning about essential oils, using them in your everyday life, and sharing essential oils with your friends via messaging or on your favourite social networks.
It covers:

* 234 health conditions
* 79 essential oils
* 19 oil blends
* general guidelines for use
* no ads !

The app features a guide section that details over 234 health conditions for which essential oils are commonly used to help support the body‚Äôs natural ability to heal itself.  Additionally, you can find information on over 60 single oils and 19 commercially-available oil blends that will help you better understand and use essential oils.

Using this app will help you discover how aromatherapy can benefit your everyday life, improve your health and well-being naturally.  

The app also includes essential oil application instructions and protocols to promote well-being.

This app is ideal for Wellness Advocates when meeting with clients, even if there is no internet connection!

Oils: Basil, Bergamot, Birch, Cassia, Cedarwood, Cilantro, Clary Sage, Cypress, Eucalyptus, Ginger, Grapefruit, Lavander, Lime, Melaleuca, Melissa, Peppermint, Rosemary, Spearmint, Vetiver and 60 more.

Conditions: Acne, ADHD, Anorexia, Anxiety, Autism, Cellulite, Cholesterol, Chronic Pain, Common Cold, Cough, Dementia, Depression, Emotional Health, Fatigue, Fever, Hangover, Hashimoto's, Headaches, Herpes, Immune Disorders, Infections, Inflammation, Influenza, Jet Lag, Joint Pain, Low Libido, Lyme Disease, Memory, Migraines, Mood Swings, OCD, Parkinson's, PMS, Pregnancy, Respitory Issues, Seizures, Stomach Flu, Stress, Toothache, Tumors, Ulcers, Vertigo and 197 more.

DISCLAIMER: The information is a compilation of suggestions made by those that have used essential oils and has not been reviewed by medical experts. It is anecdotal information and should be treated as such. For serious medical concerns consult your doctor. Essential oils work to help bring the body into balance - thus helping the body's natural defences restore homeostasis. Essential oils are not used to "treat" medical problems.
DISCLAIMER: We are not officially affiliated with doTERRA or Young Living.

title: Wisdo
description:
** Best Personal Growth App of 2019 - Google Play **
** 2019 Google Play Award Winner - Social Impact **
** World‚Äôs Most Innovative Company - Fastcompany 2019 **

Wisdo is an app for those 17 and older.
If you are underage, you will be referred to resources we recommend so you can find the support you deserve.

Wisdo is free to download but requires a membership fee to unlock, because:
1. We give back by investing every dollar we earn in training people who can be there for you
2. We offer access to weekly sessions with Mentors who can help you achieve your goals - at no extra charge
3. We don't sell ads, protect your data and invest heavily in safety
Invest in you, for a change. You deserve it. 

Wisdo improves life by instantly surrounding you with people who will get you, because they've "been there."
Share your unique journey, connect within seconds with people who have walked your path and have helped others and in time, give back to others!
From Relationship Advice, to Personal Growth, Anxiety and everything in between - Wisdo is here to prove to you that you are never alone, especially when it matters.

1. Share Your Unique Story
Your personal profile will tell others what you have been through. The more you share, the more helpful people you can bond with

2. Connect to People Just Like You
Discover people you can benefit from connecting to based on shared experiences; also, join Mentors sessions. 

3. Achieve your goals and help others achieve theirs

4. Meet friends for life
Explore more life experiences and people who have gone through them. Then, become a Guide to others!

Groups and Mentors sessions on Wisdo include:

- Anxiety
- Heartbreak
- Getting Motivated
- Coping with Depression
- Relationship Advice
- LGTBQ+ Groups
- Motherhood
- Bipolar Disorder
- ADHD
- PTSD
- College
- Finding your Dream Job
- Building Self Esteem
- Mindfulness
- Sexual Assault
- Increasing Happiness
- Chronic Pain
- Caregiving
- Reducing Stress
- Improving Sleep
- Learning to Meditate
- Eating Disorders
- Coping with Loss
- Coping with Bullying
- Acne
- Headaches and Migraines
- OCD
- Going Vegan
- Coping with Addiction
- Relocation
- Pregnancy
- Pregnancy Loss
- Schizophrenia
- Depersonalisation
- Loneliness
- Racism
- Infertility
- Genetic Testing for Adoptees
- PCOS
- Epilepsy and Seizures
- Becoming an Activist
- And hundreds more!

WISDO - MEMBERSHIP / SUBSCRIPTION:
Wisdo is free to download.
A limited version is free to use.
Access to to the full Wisdo experience requires a membership.
- We don't sell your data
- We don't pollute your experience with ads
- We moderate conversations for utmost safety and kick out trolls

Subscriptions Details:
Your Wisdo Membership will automatically renew each month, and you will be charged 9.99$ through your Google account within 24-hours prior to the end of the current monthly cycle.
A yearly Wisdo Membership is offered at a discount of up to 66%, including a 3 day trial you can cancel anytime. 
You can turn off auto-renew at any time from your Google account setting up until 24-hours before the end of the current period, but refunds will not be provided for any unused portion of the term.

Please visit our Privacy Policy and Terms Of Service for more information:
Privacy Policy - https://wisdo.com/privacy
Terms Of Service: https://wisdo.com/terms

comments: Useless app. Unless you pay; you get stuck inn1 chat room. It has 7 helpers online all with vague helpful comments following a cult like speech that they copy and paste in. So if you wanna pay to potentially improve your mental health, then it might be worth upgrading to the premium. However, as it stands, its not worth the download. . . Better to match someone on tinder and spill the beans there, its more populated...

This app has been life changing for me. This is a safe space for anyone to share and read about experiences, both good and painful, that so many of us go through in life. If you feel alone, and need somewhere to vent, to connect in a safe way, this is for you too. I've made some wonderful Wisdo online friends and I'll always be grateful. The mentor sessions have been incredibly helpful each week too. Shout out to Momma Bear, you're a freaking rockstar for caring so much about the community üíú

Used to be really good, but now you can't do anything without spending money. I had the older version when it was free and it really helped my mental health, now, I will be looking at using another app that doesn't prey on like minded people for funding.

This app stands out above others. It has a cosy , homely and comfortable feel to it. You chat and share your troubles.You can help or be helped and you learn a lot of coping skills. It has a wonderful superviser who takes care of you and youre safety. She has a fair , no nonsense approach and acts accordingly to any concerns about members who are not respecting this app . This app is like a trusted friend who is always there for you .
I got this app when it was free and I love it. I've been using it for 3 years now. I can always let it out on this app üôÇ

title: United We Care - Online Counselling & Therapy
description:
100% confidential sessions with Mental WellnessProfessionals. 

The power of being heard can be life-changing. Whenever you need someone to talk to, we are here to listen.

United We Care is your support system to get professional assistance to combat mental and emotional challenges. We are an online mental health wellness and therapy platform. Your go-to buddy to talk about your feelings with a
 professional, get guided & retrace back to a happy life.

We connect you with a network of Qualified & Certified Professionals.

On the United We Care app, you can: 
Connect with a professional via Audio, Visual & Text
Speak your heart out with Professionals having a proven track record
Get Solution to Problems that you are going through 
Book Appointments with Professionals by Speciality, Age, Years of Experience & Reviews

Features:

Guaranteed Confidentiality - Connect on a 1-1 private sessions with a professional & everything is kept confidential. 

Consult with Specialists: Don‚Äôt just connect with any counsellor but specialists. Be it Online Anxiety Counselling, Online Depression Counselling, Online Relationship Counselling, Online Marriage Counselling or Online Stress Counselling - we have professionals with years of Specialized Experience. 

Always at your disposal - Sometimes you just need someone to talk. You can consult online 24x7 with our Professionals.

Online Counselling: Can‚Äôt physically consult a Professional? Fret not, log on to the app and get help.

Holistic Mental Health Care - Everyone is different and so are our challenges. Get customized therapy and solutions to improve your mental health

Nominal Fee - You can get aid without spending big bucks.

Stella - Our Mental Health Virtual Assistant would be with you every step of the way.

Why choose United We Care?

When problems hit you like huge bricks, you need not fall and get hurt, but bounce back and overcome the challenges. The app is an honest effort to extend hands to everyone. 

We can help you with:

Depression: Get support online for Depression by talking to Professionals. Book an Online Depression Counselling session on the United We Care app, get solutions to your issues & get back on track in life with confidence. 

Anxiety: Be it Anxiety attacks, rising anxiety levels, panic attacks, or anxiety disorder, it is possible to control your thought spirals and fears with Online Anxiety Counselling. 

Stress: When you feel too many emotions, it's best not to bottle it all inside. Be it stress issues, stage fright issues or personal life‚Äôs daily challenges - online stress counselling is at your fingertips.
 
Relationship Counseling: Whether you‚Äôre going through a breakup or feeling a weak bond with your partner, online relationship counselling can provide you with ongoing support & guidance. Talk to an Online Counselor for Relationships with a few clicks.

Marriage Counselling: Consult privately for online marriage counseling & let an online relationship advisor help you with ongoing marriage issues, disputes and solve your conflicts. 

Legal Help: Connect with Trusted & Experienced Lawyers Online to get a genuine legal consultation. 

We can also assist you in: 

Bipolar and Mood Disorders Counselling
Social Anxiety Counselling 
Physical Abuse Help
OCD
Self-Harm Suicidal Counselling
Identity Help

Our Professionals in:

CANADA:
Psychotherapists
Social Workers
Lawyers

INDIA: 
Psychologists
Life Coaches
Lawyers

Facing obstacles alone can be daunting; the app helps you find comfort to talk about the issues in life, fight them and move on with a positive outlook. 

United We Care is a story of people joining hands to help others overcome their respective challenges.

So download the app and start your self-care journey today!

title: Bricks Ball Crusher
description:
Welcome to "Bricks Ball Crusher!" We're back with more new content!

Bricks Ball Crusher is a classic and exciting brick game. Just play this game to relax your brain and have fun. This game is fun and challenging.
Just touch on the screen to shoot your physics balls and break the bricks.
Remember, you must break as many bricks as possible to get the highest scores and pass the levels!
We have added many special balls and surprise gifts to help overcome obstacles and get you through tough levels.

We hope that you will fall in love with this game!

Features:
1. Free to play
2. Smooth control
3. 5000+ levels
4. wonderful physics experience
5. 30+ balls and so many different bricks
6. you can play without wifi.
7. subscription options.

Download and compete with friends around the world!

comments: Fun game but ridiculous amount of adds. I refuse to pay for the no add option based off reviews. Looks like it doesn't matter if you pay or not. Is it really necessary to have to sit through adds to do anything? And I mean anything. Even if I win a level still have to watch one to move on. I spend more time watching adds than playing the game, I'm seriously thinking about deleting this app because of this!!!

Started out fine. But like other reviews have said, recent changes eliminated the consecutive games bonus ball chances. Sometimes watching the ads gets you nothing so the bonus are even more useless. I'm stuck on a level, I'm out of all my props, and no matter how many ads I watch I can't seem to have enough bonuses or luck to move passed the level. I guess I'm done playing this game (that I did buy the ad free version of in the first place)

I love this game but I'm deleting it today, I had an internet outage and I played this game it ran up 10$ worth of cell data usage in one day I assume from loading the same fours adds over and over and over and over, well you get the picture, I didn't and I learned I have never bought something from one of there adds, and now I won't have to see another ad from them again, but it's a really fun game.

The game is fun as an arcade game. Play a level and then get back to whatever work you were doing. What annoys me the most is that everytime you open the app it takes 5 seconds to show you a pop-up of the diamond membership. WHICH I HAVE NO INTEREST IN SIGNING UP FOR. I cannot recall the number of times I was about to select a level and accidentally selected one of the options for membership ALMOST making an in-app purchase without my consent. I don't mind the ads. But this is just frustrating.

It IS a pretty good game. But I watch enough ads to earn you money without them being shoved down my throat for just loading the damn game! Every greed driven game gets a 1 star rating from me. Want me to change it? Stop being greedy and understand it is just a game. You can't eat it wear it or live in it, therefore it is NOT worth what you are demanding for it!

summary: Our application contains all the various and specific information you need regarding psychological disorders

title: Anxiety Symptoms
description:
Anxiety symptoms can last for a long time, or come and go.

Each anxiety disorder has unique symptoms. Anxiety disorders are typically diagnosed when fear of non-threatening situations, places, events, or objects becomes extreme and uncontrollable.

An anxiety disorder may also be diagnosed if you have general feelings of fear or worry that interfere with your daily life and have lasted at least six months.

Most people with an anxiety disorder have a combination of physical and psychological symptoms.

There is one symptom that all anxiety disorders have in common: near-constant fear or worry about things that may happen to you now or in the future. Read on to learn what the symptoms are and how to diagnose anxiety disorders.

Some studies suggest that experiencing anxiety could increase the risk of developing certain long-term physical health problems, including diabetes, stomach ulcers and heart problems. But there's not enough evidence to say for sure exactly what the risks are, or what groups of people are most likely to be affected. Having a physical illness or disability can also make you feel stressed and anxious, so it might sometimes feel like your anxiety problems and physical health problems are part of a vicious circle.

Sometimes it might be difficult to work out whether your symptoms are totally related to anxiety, or might be related to a different illness. If you're experiencing any physical symptoms it's best to talk to your GP, so they can check out what may be causing them.

What Are the Symptoms of Anxiety or Panic Attacks?
What we think of as anxiety attacks are actually panic attacks. A panic attack is the sudden onset of intense fear or discomfort that peaks after about ten minutes, and it typically lasts no longer than 30 minutes.

Researchers think that panic attacks come about because the brain is telling the body that the fight-or-flight response, which includes a rapid heartbeat and shallow breathing, should kick in, even though there may be no threat at all. Scientists also theorize that the amygdala, which is the brain's fear processing hub, may also be activated during a panic attack.

Panic attacks may come on because of a particular event, or they may come on for no reason at all. It's been estimated that almost 23 percent of people will have at least one panic attack in their lifetime.

If your panic attacks are recurring, you are likely to be diagnosed with panic disorder. Panic disorder is a type of anxiety disorder thats characterized by persistent worry about future panic attacks or their consequences.

Researchers think that panic attacks come about because the brain is telling the body that the fight-or-flight response, which includes a rapid heartbeat and shallow breathing, should kick in, even though there may be no threat at all. Scientists also theorize that the amygdala, which is the brain's fear processing hub, may also be activated during a panic attack.

Panic attacks may come on because of a particular event, or they may come on for no reason at all. It's been estimated that almost 23 percent of people will have at least one panic attack in their lifetime.

If your panic attacks are recurring, you are likely to be diagnosed with panic disorder. Panic disorder is a type of anxiety disorder thats characterized by persistent worry about future panic attacks or their consequences.
summary: Anxiety Symptoms, Signs & Treatment
recentChanges: This app explains what the impact of anxiety can be on your body, your mind and your day-to-day life.

title: Creative Destruction
description:
Creative Destruction is a sandbox survival game that features the utmost fun of building and firing. 

In the mood for a heart-stirring showdown? You will parachute into a vast battlefield where 100-player deathmatch is raging. Outplay your way to be the last one standing.

Build the best, break the rest! Jump straight in this do-or-die battle where you can wield creative weapons, race against snowstorms, and unleash your inner beast.

Varied gameplay modes, weather and time systems bring a new level of hectic fun. Whether you fight like a lone wolf or team up, there are always surprises waiting to be explored!

Come embark on a winner-takes-all slugfest in Creative Destruction today and show‚Äôem what you could be.

title: Psious VR | Virtual reality for mental health
description:
Psious is the first all-in-one VR platform for therapists and mental health professionals. Apply more effective therapeutic interventions in less time on dozens of conditions.

Pisous offers:
- A Complete Virtual Realy therapy solution: A complete solution that includes unlimited access to the Psious VR therapy platform, a state-of-the-art VR headset for psychotherapy, and an advanced biofeedback sensor.

- An Online platform: With a clean and intuitive interface and 1-click sync with the VR headset and biofeedback, it has never been easier to apply VR therapy in the clinical practice.

- 70+ VR environments and scenes: The platform includes more than 70 virtual reality and augmented reality scenes, together with 360¬∫ videos, to treat almost any kind of mental health condition.

- Academy and learning resources: Get free access to the Psious Academy learning resources, and get certified as a VR Therapy expert through ongoing training, webinars, and courses.


The Psious platform has more than 70 virtual environments and scenes specially designed to easily treat dozens of pathologies. The therapist can use multiple therapeutic techniques (psychoeducation, gradual exposure, systematic desensitization, relaxation, distraction, acceptance and commitment, mindfulness, EMDR ‚Ä¶) to work with their patients.

It allows for the treatment of all kinds of disorders such as anxiety (phobias, panic, agoraphobia, generalized anxiety, OCD, ADHD, public speaking, exams, etc.), attention management, eating disorders, and pain management, among others.

Validated by more than 25 years of scientific studies. VR therapy provides the opportunity for mental health professionals to not only reproduce real-life scenarios but also to adapt and control these environments to suit the individual needs of their clients.

This technology allows mental health professionals to evaluate and identify their client‚Äôs fears and anxieties within the safety of a consultation room. VR is a tool that effectively facilitates the application of psychological evaluation and intervention protocols.


Main benefits of Psious for psychology and mental health:

- Personalized Treatments: It provides greater control of the stimuli. The therapist can adjust the process to the needs of each patient.

- Easy and Accessible: It offers the ability to carry out treatments in difficult-to-access stimulation configurations (For example, airplane take-offs, storms, interactions with animals)

- Greater Control: You can control what the patient experiences at all times during the session, allowing you to detect the most clinically relevant stimuli.

- Lower Cost: It is cost-effective as it allows the therapist to treat patients without leaving the office.

- Beyond the Reality: It allows repeating scenes as many times as necessary. For example, recreating 10 airplane take-offs in a row, or having the patient ride the elevator without stopping for five minutes.

- Safer Environments: Both the patient and the therapist have complete control at all times of what is happening.

- Self-training: The patient does not have to wait for the events to take place in real life but can produce and reproduce them whenever he wishes. 

- Scientifically Validated: More than a decade of controlled studies have proven the effectiveness of virtual reality therapy.

- More Privacy: It offers a greater degree of privacy than in vivo exposure.

Conscious walk meditations is really good and interactive

title: Joyster: Mental Health Journal and Life Tracker
description:
** YOUR MENTAL HEALTH TRACKER **

Mindfulness, wellness and understanding your story matter. Joyster is a smart mental health tracker and journal that allows you to track your symptoms (mental and physical) against food, exercise, activities, and social interactions happening in your life.

Joyster is a mental health & mood journal designed to feel delightful, inspirational, and beautiful. Monitor your mental health by reflecting, gaining perspective, and understanding yourself. Live a healthy lifestyle by tracking your conditions with daily notes and check-ins.

Joyster is for anyone, but especially those who struggle with anxiety, allergies, migraines, panic attacks, depression, PTSD, OCD, and bipolar disorder.

** HOW JOYSTER WORKS **

Track your happiness, stress and physical and mental symptoms against activities, exercise, food, and more. Social anxiety, for example, can be tracked to show how your anxiety is being affected by different social interactions.

Take daily notes to gain awareness on how your body and mind overlap and identify trends and triggers in your well-being. Track symptoms and see how they relate to your daily activities, such as if you are bipolar and would like to track your mania symptoms against your day to day life.

The daily tracker analyzes your data and provide positive and negative influences, such as activities, foods, exercise, and social interactions to improve your well-being. Anxiety, panic attacks and triggers can all have causes that correlate with certain aspects of your day ‚Äì Joyster can help you identify them.

Joyster uses reflection, mindfulness, cognitive behavioral therapy, and data to help you understand yourself and build a habit of reflection & self-care. Develop healthy habits to help improve your mental and physical health.


** HOW JOYSTER IS DIFFERENT **

Symptom tracker designed for efficiency. Monitor yourself with check-ins throughout your day, while still keeping it relevant and personalized to you.

Track health personalized to your needs. Track meals, insomnia, your daily caffeine intake or anything else that can affect your mood, even how you feel each time you interact with a specific co-worker! Joyster is flexible and personalized to you.

Visual health tracker graphs your entire well-being for you. See how your symptoms and activities overlap and gain an in-depth analysis of best to worse influences in your life.

JOYSTER FEATURES

SYMPTOM TRACKER
- Track your mood and conditions throughout the day
- Journal and identify what outside influences impact your mood
- Track migraines, allergies, pain and more
- Track anxiety, depression and more

DAILY MOOD JOURNAL
- Daily mental health check-ins to see how you‚Äôre doing
- Add a note to mark anything important
- Log your conditions in 30 seconds

TRACK YOUR HAPPINESS
- Understand what influences your mood and conditions
- Customize based on your life and needs
- Identify patterns and triggers
- Create healthy habits

TRACK HEALTH AND CONDITIONS
- Body tracker
- Migraine and headache
- Allergies
- OCD
- PTSD
- Anxiety
- BPD
- Pain
- Stress
- Sleep tracker
- Depression
- Social anxiety
- And more

SELF-CARE AND TREATMENT
- Journal your journey with the built-in diary to look back on your day
- Activity tracker to follow your daily activities and their impact
- Self-care tracker lets you see how you‚Äôre taking care of yourself
- Self-care suggestions and insights for self-improvement
- Build a healthy lifestyle through awareness and self-care

Get a healthy lifestyle and better understand yourself, your mental health and your conditions with Joyster.

** SAY HI TO US **

We'd love to connect with you! Please don't hesitate to reach out to us on social if you have any feedback or questions:

‚Ä¢ Facebook - https://facebook.com/joysterapp
‚Ä¢ Instagram - @joyster.app

title: Deepstash - Self Improvement, Motivation & Care
description:
Think of Deepstash as your personal library of thoughts and knowledge. A daily source of inspiring & life changing stories and ideas. Read articles, learn skills, get productivity tips and discover life hacks. All curated by our team and presented to you in a simple, practical and easy to remember, short summarized format. Fuel your curiosity and get smarter daily.

It's like your social media feed, if your social media feed had things that mattered :-)

Content & articles that matter to you. Our team curates the best stories around the web (articles, videos, podcasts & more, from top publications and magazines like Medium, Inc, Lifehacker, Forbes, Mark Manson, FastCompany, BBC, Tony Robbins & more) and provides actionable and inspiring short form key insights to improve yourself personally and professionally. A wealth of self help knowledge in your pocket.

Have questions? You‚Äôll surely get answers by reading, learning and exploring a world of hard and soft skills as well as interests like time management, self improvement, leadership, self-confidence, motivation or psychology, that will make you a great fit anywhere in life you put your mind to.

Summarized ideas. You need just 5 minutes per day. Our team works for you. We provide a summary of the main insights of articles and other web content in a short and crisp 100 words or less format we call ‚Äúideas‚Äù.

Escape the negativity and time wasting pull of social media platforms. Our app‚Äôs goal is to help you towards self improvement and self care and to get you motivated, inspired, wiser and productive.

Personalized content & feed. Choose a few topics of interest (like self improvement, time management, problem solving, love & relationships & more) and then just use the app at your leisure. As you save ideas and use our app, we learn what you like and find the best stories and articles to show you every day, so you‚Äôre motivated and inspired. You don‚Äôt even have to work for it.

The more you save ideas the better we learn what articles and topics you love. We refresh your recommendations multiple times a day so you never run out of fresh stories and ideas.

Build and organize your knowledge. You can save ideas in your own personal profile and build your own hub of facts, skills, quotes, information and ideas that matter to you.

Search and filter your ideas and articles by recent, oldest or most popular and organise your knowledge into personalised stashes, which are basically collections of insights stocked up and ready to go for when you need them: a Powerpoint presentation, a new job interview, a date, a project at work, or negotiating your rent with the landlord.

Share your knowledge. We make it super easy for you to share the best articles, quotes, stories and ideas on any channel you want. Send it to a friend on Whatsapp or share it with your followers on Instagram.

Share a link to ideas or just an image. We built special image formats for each social network (Instagram, Facebook, Twitter and others) so your ideas look best.

No ads. No distractions. 100% Free. The Deepstash app is free and open to everyone. Get a clean reading experience and focus on the content instead of being distracted with annoying ads or dozens of notifications about ‚Äúpremium‚Äù subscriptions. Just get a quick free account (Facebook & Google login) and you‚Äôre good to go. 

And we‚Äôll never sell, lease or share your data. Your privacy is really important to us.

Learn new things and become a better, smarter you, with the Deepstash app!

We're always open to feedback, ideas and thoughts about anything that might make our app the best app it can be. Give us a shout at hello@deepstash.com. We read every single email we get :-)

Have a look at our website and social stuff:

deepstash.com
instagram.com/deepstash
twitter.com/deepstash
facebook.com/deepstash

We (sometimes) write on Medium: https://medium.com/infinite-learners

This is an amazing app!!!!I am writing my review after one month of using it and the app gives me some inspirational ideas and strategies to make my lifestyle better in a progressive manner.However, I am giving 4 stars because of the bugs.When I open the app,it freezes for a few minutes and works.I hope it can be rectified on upcoming updates. EDIT : Thanks for the response from the team! It just works fine now . Reinstall fixed the bugs. I already had the latest 4.3.0 and it had bugs somehow..

Instead of swiping to read the next article, may I suggest putting an icon that we can tap on to go to the next article instead of swiping? when scrolling on the current article that I'm reading, I accidentally scroll too far to the left/right and it goes to the next article and when I go back, it didn't even refresh to where I left off! I love this app, I prefer it more than social media, but it's so annoying when I accidentally swipe on the next article and have to go back & scroll down again!

In a world that seems to be a raging dumpster fire, and everything in social media and news pointing to how bad things are getting... This app is a breath of fresh air. It offers simple, memorable morsels of wisdom. Easily consumable. It is so important to focus on what we can control---ourselves. Working on bettering ourselves, our mindsets, and expanding our horizons is the way we change the world. I am adding this app to my home screen and making a commitment to read articles daily. Great app

This is just so worth it. If I were to recommend something that is worth accessing, well this is pretty much on my top list of reads. I'm loving this, the settings, the articles in it and the concepts of developing such an app was so just so impressive. Hats off to the developers and creators.

title: Peak ‚Äì Brain Games & Training
description:
Peak is the fun, free brain training workout designed around you. Peak uses brain games and puzzles to challenge memory, language and critical thinking to keep your mind active. 

With brain games made in partnership with academics from leading universities like Cambridge and NYU, and more than 12m downloads, Peak is a fun, challenging brain training experience.

It takes just 10 minutes a day to complete a brain training workout. And, with 45 brain games for adults, and new brain training workouts every day, there is always a fun challenge waiting for you.


KEY FEATURES
 
- Free brain games to challenge your Memory, Attention, Math, Problem Solving, Mental Agility, Language, Coordination, Creativity and Emotion Control.
- Learn which categories your brain excels in, and compete with friends by comparing your brainmap and brain game performance.
- Coach, the personal trainer for your brain, helps you track your progress and improve.
- Cognitive brain training with games from expert researchers at Cambridge University, NYU and more.
- Works offline so you can enjoy Peak brain games wherever you are.
- Selected by Google as Editor's Choice.
- More than 45 brain games available and regular updates to keep you challenged. 
- Get personalised brain training workouts and in-depth insights with Peak Pro.
- Get access to Peak Advanced Training modules: intensive programs that train a specific skill, including the new Wizard memory game created with Professor Barbara Sahakian and Tom Piercy in the Department of Psychiatry at the University of Cambridge.
 

IN THE NEWS

‚ÄúIts mini games focus on memory and attention, with strong detail in its feedback on your performance.‚Äù - The Guardian

‚ÄúImpressed with graphs in Peak that let you see your performance over time.‚Äù - The Wall Street Journal

‚ÄúThe Peak app is designed to provide each user with a profound level of insight into their current state of cognitive function.‚Äù - Techworld


DEVELOPED BY NEUROSCIENTISTS
 
Designed in collaboration with experts in neuroscience, cognitive science and education, Peak makes brain training fun and rewarding. Peak's scientific advisory board includes Professor Barbara Sahakian FMedSci DSc, Professor of Clinical Neuropsychology at the University of Cambridge.
 
Follow us - twitter.com/peaklabs
Like us - facebook.com/peaklabs

Say hi - hello@peak.net
 

For more information:

recentChanges: Your brain is unique and that‚Äôs why Coach creates personal workouts just for you. But we all have specific skills we want to challenge and so we‚Äôre introducing Workout Selection. comments: It's a solid app with a lot of challenges. Some of them pretty simple and common, other instead are very difficult, I love this balance. I used to play Elevate last year and I decided to change for something different, however there are few games (especially math ones) that I wish to have here as well! Hoping to see some new game in the future (:

The games on here are very good and I enjoyed playing them. Whether they actually do anything for your brain or whether you simply get better at playing them is an interesting and ongoing question! My only criticism is that the language is very american-based and so can be quite challenging if you are UK English speaking because you don't understand what object you should be looking for for example in the find the object game. Overall excellent.

First few weeks things were good, . Now my R√†ting has gone from 4 to 2. I have free version and am supposed to watch videos. Yeh, right! I push play and screens says "loading video" but it Never does. After 30 sec, I get bumped back to play screen, very boring ! If I was not a bed ridden senior citizen w/covid complications, it would not bother me so badly. I rebooted my ph & reinstalled your app too many, times~NO change. I enjoyed what little I saw of Peak. Hasta la vista !

I like the app. It brings me a lot of mental challenges, that are quite interesting. It really increases our IQ. The only problem I am facing is performance. Whenever a game starts or even in the middle of the same, it stutters and freezes, randomly. It doesn't occur often, but it disturbs, especially on timing challenges. OTT, the app is look good üôÇüëçüèª

Honestly, I never leave reviews, but I really do love this app! I paid for all the content and most of the time when I buy in app purchases for more content, I am left pretty bored and dissatisfied, but Peak is the only app so far that hasn't left me feeling like that! So thank you, and I really enjoy training daily to get me into the zone for using my mind for the rest of the day, as well as being able to see the progress I am making compared to other people within my age group.

title: Sleep Cycle: Sleep analysis & Smart alarm clock
description:
Relax, sleep better and wake up feeling rested with Sleep Cycle, the smart alarm clock. Track sleep from bedtime to morning, and get detailed analysis with the app that makes waking up in the morning just that bit easier. 

Track sleep using your phone and start your day feeling energized with our intelligent alarm clock and sleep tracker. Its unique design only wakes you up while you‚Äôre in your light sleep phase. Plus, you‚Äôll get detailed reports as Sleep Cycle monitors your sleep patterns, from bedtime until you're waking up. Track sleep and use the data to help you sleep better today! 

‚è∞ Waking up made easy - 5 reasons you‚Äôll love Sleep Cycle:

1. Sleep better with a gentle wake up call - Sleep Cycle‚Äôs alarm clock wakes you up while you‚Äôre in light sleep and is a natural way to start your day.
2. Relax at bedtime and track sleep easily - Learn about your sleep patterns with detailed analysis. 
3. A sleep tracker with a difference - There‚Äôs no phone under your pillow, you can track sleep by placing your device on the nightstand or close by on the floor. 
4. Your health comes first - Your sleep data and reports will help you feel great inside and out. 
5. Sleep better - Relax and let Sleep Cycle analyse your light sleep, deep sleep and overall health.

Relax with a good night‚Äôs sleep that will do wonders for your health. 

Download Sleep Cycle today - waking up in the morning has never been easier! 

Free features

‚àö Sleep analysis with Sleep Cycle patented sound technology, or accelerometer
‚àö Detailed sleep statistics and daily sleep graphs
‚àö Carefully selected alarm melodies
‚àö Snooze by shaking or double tapping the phone lightly
‚àö Customizable wake-up window. From instant (regular alarm clock), up to 90 minutes

Premium features

‚àö Sleep aid - helps you fall asleep easier

REQUIREMENTS
Ability to charge your phone by the bed.

recentChanges: Bug fixes and improvements.
comments: I love the sleep tracker feature on this! I upgraded just to accurately record my sleep and it has improved over time. One feature I wish it could do in the tracker is combine different sleep sessions in same day. For example, I like to take a 30min nap during lunch break. Sometimes at night, I am woken up to take dog out, or use the facilities. When I stop and restart it, it only records the most recent session.

Doesn't always record analysis. Some mornings you turn the alarm off (the alarm that is part of this app) and it simply does nothing instead of displaying your sleep record. It seems random as to when it works. In particular when you turn the alarm off and it goes to snooze (another glitch) it fails to record.

I benefited from this app a few years ago and need to do this again. Why did it switch from accelerometer to microphone? How will it know if I've stopped breathing or just changed sides? The accelerometer was way cool.

The microphone tracking is a great idea and seems well implemented, but there are two issues that baffle me that are easily fixed: 1) I often wake up early and want to know if I've gotten enough sleep. Show me. Why make me remember what time I went to bed and calculate? 2) It knows when I'm awake or asleep based on the microphone data so why doesn't it subtract out the time I was not sleeping? "In bed" time should be a second, less-important metric. Time actually asleep is more important.

It works. Its got a well designed UX. It really helps people with disorders such as ADHD where following a regular routine is important, but regular alarms are too discordant. I like the fact that the upgrade screen is at the beginning. The design is Honest. So all in all, well done.

title: mental health
description:
mental health
Do you want to free yourself from stress and depression?
Do you feel that at times you lose your calm and anxiety do not allow you to see things clearly?
Then this app is perfect for you.
Find tips tips and tools to face life and see things differently.
Forget the symptoms of anxiety and stress, anxiety disorder and all kinds of psychiatric illness.
What is mental health?
Currently, the World Health Organization defines mental health as: "A state of well-being in which the individual is aware of his own abilities, can cope with the normal stresses of life, can work productively and fruitfully, and is capable of Make a contribution to your community. "

Love, Work and Play

And, how do you get to that state of well-being? For Sigmund Freud's well-known definition of mental health as the ability to love, to work, and to play, remains absolutely valid.

The ability to love refers to the possibility of establishing authentic and intimate relationships with other people where you can give and receive affection without excessive fear. The capacity to work refers to the possibility of feeling generative, of feeling that what one does makes sense, of having a certain pride in the tasks that one performs. The ability to play refers to the possibility of enjoying the symbolic activity, to the level that is, and to be able to enjoy with others in that type of activities.

Mental health includes our emotional, psychic, and social well-being. It affects the way we think, feel, and act when we deal with life. It also helps determine how we handle stress, relate to others, and make decisions. Mental health is important in all stages of life, from childhood and adolescence to adulthood.

Mental illnesses are serious conditions that can affect your thinking, your mood and your behavior. There are many causes of mental illness. Your genes and your family history may play a role, as well as your life experiences like stress or a history of abuse. Other causes may be biological. Mental disorders are common, but treatments are available.
Mental health is, in general terms, the state of balance between a person and their socio-cultural environment that guarantees their labor, intellectual and relationship participation to achieve a well-being and quality of life. The term "mental health" is commonly used in a manner similar to "health or fitness", defining mental health as follows: "mental health encompasses a wide range of activities directly or indirectly related to the health component. Mental well-being included in WHO's definition of health: "a state of complete physical, mental and social well-being and not just the absence of disease or illness"
Mental health is an app where you will find ....
-Distintas ways to face the symptoms of the stress and the symptoms of depression
- Practical tips to improve your life from the inside out.
- how to deal with mental disorders such as bipolar disorder, anxiety disorder.
-the best treatment of anxiety.
- Relaxation and meditation tools to control moods at any time.
-tips to beat stress anxiety and depression.
-a series of steps focused on your personal improvement.
-more material that we will upload and the opportunity to contribute ideas for the improvement of our content.

Change your mind, forget the stresses of depression and anxiety with mental health.
Download this app for FREE right now!
What are you waiting?
Renew tea and relax in a different way.
Click on download NOW and begin the adventure of finding yourself!

comments: I love this app because it keeps my mind busy. It is a learning app, which a lot of the things in this app is more than I can understand. Because I think I get the right answer and I don't because it shows me the answer to I believe.

I really enjoy this app! There are a few grammatical errors, but I don't understand why that is a problem for some,it's the message/information that counts,it's still readable,& surely that's the main thing. Excellent information,IMHO,so 5 stars from me. Only minor issue so far,is sometimes if I wish to share,there's a pop-up reading "Error-Fill"? But it doesn't hinder me from sharing,so it's not really a "problem" per s√®. Thank you so much Dhanesha,~please keep it upüëçüèºüòäüëçüèª,Miss D

Accurate for the most part, but definitely some questionable 'facts'. A lot of them also seem to contradict themselves. A few repetitions but I was expecting that. The grammar really isn't as bad as some of the other reviews say, it's not illegible or anything, just a little off in the sentence structures. I found it perfectly easy to understand. Overall, good to learn some new information, but if you don't already know a bit of psychology you might not be able to tell which facts aren't true.

I was not expecting much from this app. I was not expecting every fact to be repeated 3x in each section. While they may have been interesting the first time I read one... not so much the 2nd time, & the 3rd time was a complete disappointment. It should read: "Eleven New Facts Repeated Three Times." Granted I stopped reading after the second section was just like the first.

it's basically a good app. you have to think for yourself and be aware of ANYTHING that you read, not accepting another person's written word just because it's there. errors and typos shouldn't be an issue if you are a self thinker. the original is probably in a language other than english and when translated (by a translation app) word for word some things will be lost or skewed in the translation. all of this should be considered in our review. so I give it a 3.

title: Mental Illness Assessment Tests
description:
Mental Illness Self-Assessment Tests & Psychological Tests and Quizzes is a FREE tool to assess mental health issues patients from all over the world are experiencing. The quiz based approach help you understand if there are any clinical signs of anxiety and mental disorder. 

Its content is simple to understand and very useful. You will be able to learn, consult, and evaluate many characteristics about your personality and also if you suffer from anxiety disorders, mood disorders, eating disorders, addiction problems, etc. 

In addition, there is helpful information about love, related subjects about relationships, about who you are and how your psyche works. 

Knowledge from Professionals of Psychology directly to you

‚Ä¢	Colon Cancer Self-Assessment Quiz To know if you Show Any Clinical Signs Of Colon Cancer 
‚Ä¢	Self-Assessment Screening For Agoraphobia Anxiety Disorders 
‚Ä¢	Suicidal Thoughts Disorder Test 
‚Ä¢	Jealousy Test - Do You Possess All Qualities To Become A Perfect Life Partner Or Are You A Jealous Abusive Careless Person Compared To Your Partner 
‚Ä¢	Orgasmic Disorder Test Anorgasmia Test 
‚Ä¢	Schizophrenia Test
‚Ä¢	Couple Communication Quiz How Effective Is Your Communication With Partner 
‚Ä¢	Anxiety And Post Traumatic Stress Disorder PTSD Test 
‚Ä¢	Gambling Addiction Test For Those Suffering From Compulsive Gambling Addiction
‚Ä¢	Drug Addiction Test To Check For The Signs Of Drug Dependence Addiction And Abuse 
‚Ä¢	Anxiety Disorder Test 
‚Ä¢	Emotional Dependency Test 
‚Ä¢	Color Blindness Tetrachromacy Test 
‚Ä¢	Psychological Abuse Test If You Feel Your Partner Is Emotionally Abusing You 
‚Ä¢	Fear Of Commitment Personality Assessment Test (Gamophobia) 
‚Ä¢	Sexual Desire Disorder Self Assessment Test - Are You Suffering From Hypoactive Sexual Desire Disorder (HSDD) 
‚Ä¢	Anorexia Noervosa Test 
‚Ä¢	Eating Disorder Test 
‚Ä¢	Toxic Relationship Assessment Test 
‚Ä¢	Sex Addiction Test 
‚Ä¢	Anxiety Disorder Obsessive-Compulsive Disorder (OCD) Assessment Quiz 
‚Ä¢	Lesbian Quiz - Are You Lesbian 
‚Ä¢	Gay Test - Reveal If You Are Gay Bisexual Or Straight 
‚Ä¢	Food Addiction Test
‚Ä¢	Teenage Depression Quiz To See If Your Teen is suffering from depression 
‚Ä¢	Erectile Dysfunction Test For Men
‚Ä¢	Social Anxiety Disorder (Social Phobia) Assessment Quiz
‚Ä¢	Super Color Vision Test Are You Gifted With The Very Rare Tetrachromacy Eye Condition
‚Ä¢	PTSD Test - Quiz To Check If You Are Suffering From PTSD Post Traumatic Stress Disorder 
‚Ä¢	OCD Magical Thinking Test - Religious Beliefs And Magical Thinking  
‚Ä¢	Mesothelioma Signs Quiz 
‚Ä¢	General Mental Health Checkup Assessment To Understand Your Depression Anxiety Phobia PTSD And Stress Level 
‚Ä¢	Alcohol Addiction Test
‚Ä¢	Free Depression Test To Find Out Low Moderate Or Severe Depression Levels In You 
‚Ä¢	Female Sexual Arousal Disorder Test Is Self-Assessment Approach To Know If You Or Your Body Are Developing Related Signs 
‚Ä¢	Attention Deficit Hyperactivity Disorder (ADHD) Test 
‚Ä¢	Self-Assessment Generalized Anxiety Disorder (GAD) Test 
‚Ä¢	Philophobia Test Fear Of Falling in Love Personality Assessment 
‚Ä¢	Assertiveness Personality Test
‚Ä¢	Detection of Drug Use Addiction Test 

Based on the test results, if you are worries about your mental health, we recommend to immediately consult with your Doctor or Psychiatrist so they can review your medical history along with the results of this test and suggest treatment plan.
If you have suicidal thoughts, immediately contact National Suicide Prevention Lifeline - 1-800-273-8255. The line is available 24 X 7 and support in both English and Spanish language is available.
Warning : This is to make it clear that the medical information on this app doesn‚Äôt substitute a doctor‚Äôs advice.
This information is for educational purposes only, and not meant to provide medical advice, treatment, or diagnosis. Remember to always consult your Psychiatrist or health care provider before starting, stopping, or altering a treatment.
