title: LG Health
description:
LG Health tracks your activity levels and provides an interface and related content based on that information, so all types of users can customize the app to fit their own activity levels. 

Beginner
You can see beginner exercise info when exercise is not part of your daily routine. The exercise circle shows the progress to your goal over 24 hours. Tap the circle to see the type of exercises you have done.	

Advanced
You can see advanced exercise info when exercise is part of your daily routine. The exercise circle shows the progress to your goal over 24 hours by type and intensity. Tap the circle to see your weekly exercise trends in a graph. You can also add logs manually.	

Tips‚Ä®
You can see personalized tips above the exercise circle. Tips are shown according to your lifestyle and exercise patterns.

Accessory
Manage your fitness activities, track your weight and monitor your diet using LG Smart Watch and Tone Active.

Conditions
The App supports all LG smartphones and includes Non-LG Android smartphones as well.
Tablets and some mobile devices may not be supported. Some functions may not be available based on regions/service providers/devices. LG Health requires Android OS 4.4 or above. Please note that LG Health is intended for fitness and wellness purposes only and is not intended for use in the diagnosis of disease or other conditions, or in the cure, mitigation, treatment, or prevention of disease.

recentChanges:
* From the Android 10, need to update and re-login for LG Health service(Ranking and sync).
* According to Google policies, From the Oreo OS(Android 8.0), LG Health app alerts are always displayed in the notification window.
You can setting app notifications by touching and holding the notification.
Turning off notifications may limit some features.
* Activity recognition of cycling and climbing stairs are no longer supported.
* Does not support login with Amazon account.
comments: This is an applicable widget, but I found a shortage on it. For example, during daily activity, while I'm in the car, the widget is still counting my steps, while I'm not walking. So I suggest you to put some useful keys on the widget i.e. play/pause/stop, in order to use this application just during exercise or at the time that we need do some activites.

The app needs to allow for the customer to be able to add the information on the types of exercises even if it the day after. This app does not allow to add information if you forgot to do it on the specific day. Also is too light. They need to af more features.
Very accurate step count. Within 25 inches. Lousy complicatef UI.

You should be able to choose whether or not you want to have this app on you phone. There should be a sign in option as well. If you want to erase the data you've entered that should be an option as well. Nowadays people are using their smartwatches to track their fitness. Stop prompting me to update an app I don't want to use, it's taking up space.

Please increase the font size and contrast of info on the widget. There is plenty of room for a larger font. The white letters against the gray background make it even harder to read. Also the number of steps is unreadable in both colors because of the font and the bright colors. Thank you.

title: Drone : Shadow Strike 3
description:
Soldier! The eye in the sky is back, wafting in the air - silent but deadly. Your enemies won‚Äôt see you coming, and before they realize, it‚Äôll be too late. 

Drone Shadow Strike 3 delivers the most intense free-to-play drone reconnaissance simulation on mobile. Drop-in, Gear up, Sniper-up and compete. Help the ground troops who are left to survive with shadow strikes. 

Drone Shadow Strike is back with evolved war action and advanced military arsenal to push the excitement of first-person shooter games even further. Drone Shadow Strike 3 carries the legacy of its predecessor. It's time to enter the battlefield, strategize your moves and test your skills to dominate the resistance and bring world peace.

Operate the world‚Äôs best UCAVs and shoot your way through a series of action-filled covert missions, using ultra-high-tech equipment and weapons including rockets, missiles, Bombs, gunships, cannons, etc. Disrupt the enemy control, provide close Air Support and raid Enemy Bases worldwide before they take you out.

REALISTIC TARGETING SYSTEM
Strategize your attacks with MALE (Mid Altitude Long Endurance) Drones for precision targeting and HALE (High Altitude Long Endurance) Drones for greater area damage
- Take aim through your crosshairs and complete missions and challenges

DAILY MISSIONS
Get a Daily Mission and just one shot at it. 
Strategize to Annihilate, Defend and Hunt in these Precision Strike missions.

LIVE EVENTS
- Immersive Gameplay - Compete with players engaged in FPS battles with real-world inspired environments
- Choose your style - Go with epic explosions or stick to covert guns-a-blaze gameplay
- Complete missions - Survive through high tension enemy attacks or escort your on-ground battalion to safety
- Top the Leader-boards - Master your shooting skills and win fabulous rewards
- Play The Zombie Events. Unleash fire into the dead from your Drones. 

KILL-CAM FINISHER
- Cement your victory with the Kill-Cam Finisher
- Lock-in on your target and follow your kill to its destruction
- The slow-mo style adds to the drama and the satisfaction

MASSIVE BATTLE MAPS
- Gaze upon next-gen GFX that allow for an unprecedented rendering of environments
- Adapt to changing terrain & fog, switching between regular UAV Dash-cam and FLIR Thermal Cam
- Improved SFX and voice acting will immerse you in dire scenarios
So, step into one of the best military warfare experiences that offer an addictive mixture of strategy, fast-paced combat, and real action!

FEATURES:
- Fly different types of gunships, from prototypes to official in-service aircraft!
- Defend, Survive, Strike or Escort
- Simple and easy intuitive touch controls - Command the battle with your fingertip
- 49 missions in 8 real-world inspired campaigns
- 4 types of weapons and 21 ways to light‚Äòem up
- 7 Additional enhancements - Dominate the battlefield with airstrikes, nukes & more!
- 20 official Ranks - Start as an army Airman Basic and rise up to command as a Master General


Ever-evolving game: Daily Missions, Live Events & Challenges, with monthly updates delivering new features and Game modes.

Soldier! Your country needs you. Dominate the resistance and show them the marksman you are. Be the Ultimate Combat Commander and make your squad proud.
May victory belong to you! Over and Out!

The game is completely free to play but some in-game items require an in-app payment. You can turn off the payment feature by disabling in-app purchases on your device.

* Permission:
- READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE: For saving your game data & progress.
- WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE: For saving your game data & progress

*Also optimized for tablet devices

Follow us: https://twitter.com/RelianceGames
Watch us: http://www.youtube.com/reliancegames
Visit us: http://www.reliancegames.com

title: Disorder
description:
Welcome to Disorder.
The year is 2030, and war has become the new global norm. In an ongoing conflict for nuclear weapons and the spoils of war, multiple factions meet each other on the battlefield. In this endless war, justice and sin are intertwined and no one escapes the undercurrent of violence. As an elite soldier, the time has come for you to take up arms and fight alongside your teammates!

Five limited-time activities have been organized to celebrate the official launch of the game. A large range of rich rewards, such as characters, outfits and supplies, have been added. Wish you an unprecedented team shooter experience!

IMMERSIVE EXPERIENCE
All-new near-future locations, such as Ruins, Radar Stations, and Missile Silos have been built for war themed battles. As a soldier in this world, you can pledge your loyalty to three very different factions: Pale Knights, Ghost Puppets, and Cadaver Unit, with more to be revealed. Each member of the armed factions has his/her own exhaustive backstory for you to uncover. Good or evil, the choice is up to you!

UNIQUE CHARACTERS
Scout, maneuver, defense, support...characters are classed into different roles, allowing for great freedom and diversity in team setup. They are not only differentiating between personality, appearance and back story, but even unique skillsets and weapon loadouts types too. It‚Äôs up to you to control the tempo of a battle where the odds might be reversed at any time.

UPGRADE IN BATTLE 
Gain EXP and credits from mercenary or player killing. With diversified choices, you can upgrade both the weapon and ability to adapt to the ever-changing battlefield. Strengthen yourself from the landing point until you are ready to try and take control of the Missile Silo.

MULTI-MODE AVAILABLE
ULF, Base Battle, Multi-Base Battle are 3 core game modes, with more to come. For the ULF map, you need to work with your teammates and establish a plan of action to occupy and secure the area‚Äôs missile silo. On the way to victory, every decision and bullet matters. While in Base Battle and Multi-base Battle, close combat happens and situations can be changed by second.

SEASON 0 KICKS OFF
Season 0 is coming! Introducing a brand-new Season Ranking System and generous Season Pass rewards. Get ready to show your strength as you battle other players for the win!

SQUAD UP AND RULE THE FIELD
Team up with teammates to compete against enemy groups. Go directly to the missile silo or level up safely to take down bases one by one? It is all up to strategical cooperation with your teammates! Think on your feet, find alternative attack strategies and adapt your lineup is with the same importance to grab victory.

Follow us on
Official Website: www.playdisorder.com
Facebook Page: www.facebook.com/playdisorder
Discord: https://discord.gg/disorder
Twitter: twitter.com/disorderen
YouTube: http://www.youtube.com/c/Disordergame
descriptionHTML:
Welcome to Disorder.
The year is 2030, and war has become the new global norm. In an ongoing conflict for nuclear weapons and the spoils of war, multiple factions meet each other on the battlefield. In this endless war, justice and sin are intertwined and no one escapes the undercurrent of violence. As an elite soldier, the time has come for you to take up arms and fight alongside your teammates!

Five limited-time activities have been organized to celebrate the official launch of the game. A large range of rich rewards, such as characters, outfits and supplies, have been added. Wish you an unprecedented team shooter experience!

IMMERSIVE EXPERIENCE

comments: You say there are still future plans that a new season with new content will be released gradually. And you want the players to be patient. I would say its too late for that since many have now decided to uninstall this game, since your last announcement. Promises of future content isn't what makes a great game. The lack of providing a fresh new gaming experience to the players is what brings a game crashing down. I too have decided to uninstall Disorder since your last announcement.

The reason why I put 4 stars is because when I first downloaded the game, I thought it was impossible to win but all you need is strategy. Another reason is because when ever I am matching, it would take a lot of time to let me in a group. Other than that, the graphics and the gameplay is the one of the BEST. I highly recommend this game. Like LEGIT.

This game has been in Season 0 for months now since it's launch, there has been no updates and no changes what so ever, you guys really gotta focus on updating your games more cuz it gets really boring when theres nothing new, I've enjoyed the game when it was just launched but now since there's nothing new it just got really boring.

This is a cool game, indeed. But a while ago, my friend got trashtalked for a stupid reason. Her teammates camped in opponents base while my friend just played the game normally than they did. What's the use of base battle if their just gonna kill the opponent and not capture the base, right?! I hope that the players are playing fair. And also she's lagging even though her connections fine!!! That's why she deleted the game. I don't think she'll play this anymore. Full of foul players!

The game mechanics are great the characters and skills aswell but thiers 2 things I dont like about the game 1. is that the servers right now aren't that good u can be waiting for a match to start 5mins or more that is if ur lucky, I've been playing solo this whole time for that reason. 2. When I first download this game I thought oh this is going to be a Battle royale since I'm into last man standing but it's more like capture the flag and pretty much ur efforts are worthless so for now byeüëã

title: Album Art Changer
description:
Downloads and sets album art to your music collection. Get art search result for any song. Also allows you to edit tags.

Features:-
Set album art per song basis instead of album
High quality Images
Can save both to tags and android database
Saving to tags lets the cover art to persist while moving the mp3 to different computer or device
Choose cover art from gallery
Edit tags such as title,album,artist
Save Album Art to Gallery
Play Songs
Delete Songs

If your music player doesn't detects changed album art, try clearing it's cache by going into Settings->Apps->Your Music Player->Clear data

If your music player shows duplicate album art, then they use Mediastore database which is limited to 1 album art per album. Ask them to use Tags for showing unique album art.

comments: Editing my review after messing around with it. It's still just alright. I wish I could do multiple songs at once however. And if I have one album but different artists, I have to use one album art overall (at least in my music player anyway). But if I change those album names the album art is correct. Edit: Now no longer works as intended. Art is changed in the app but my music player doesn't update it accordingly.

One of the best Album art changers on playstore. But, off lately it is doing nothing. When I open the app, the advertisement loads at the start ü§£ but the songs list doesn't appear at all even after waiting for a long. üòµ. Hence the main objective of changing the album art is never fulfilled. Very disappointing.

The app is excellent as a song tag editor but the biggest flaw it has is that it shows vulgar dating apps advertisements and it annoys me a lot. Edit: Now it shows some quality ads like of Google pay and Audible Audiobooks. But to be honest I don't like ads.

Does what it says. Really impressed with the so easy to use interface. Also it is really easy to change the album arts. Even i could find the album arts for some songs which i was unable to find and other apps that i used. Great app. Definitely deserves 5 stars.

Works fine but like most apps these days greed has over come the developer causing the app non usable due to advert invasion. Literally every time you do an action on this app (touch the screen) a 30 second advert pops up. Personally I label apps like this as malware due to the invasive advert attacks. I absolutely understand developers need to make money but there is an acceptable line and this dev has way crossed it. Shame cus the coding is great

comments: Used to be good. But the non stop ads with annoying loud noise everytime you open an image is unbelievably a waste of time. Its non stop and continuous. Uninstalled. I loved this app so much that I paid for a yearly subscription only to be told that after three months I needed to repurchase. I followed the instructions and tried to contact the developer with no response. Stupidly I purchased again for the 2 year subscription ( stupid I know) only to have the exact same problem. I tried to problem solve again with no resolution to this problem. Tried to contact someone with no response. I am out nearly $40 and very frustrated. Won't make this mistake again

Money grabber, of course. Allows you to use premium features that it doesn't label as such and THEN hits you up to start a free trial. $25 a year is not horrible, but I like the apps that give you a GOOD free version. And this one doesn't seem to have a good free version. I haven't decided if I want to support this app or not. I'll keep looking for sure. It also makes you sign up immediately with no guest option that I saw.

I like this app , it's amazing and easy to use. It's very creative, adjustable, let.you choose from alot of different veiws how you can design your photo. I just really like it , I'm glad I finally found an app for my photo's I'm always looking for photo apps. I really.enjoyed working with it.

And list option gives you the recipe for your looks and makeup Choices. From brands to shadow patterns, and brow shapes you chose.

title: iMoodJournal
description:
This beautiful app is an ultimate mood journal, personal diary and charting tool. It will help you discover causes of your ups and downs, and get surprising insights into yourself!

* Featured on NY Times, NY Daily News, made "The Best Bipolar Disorder iPhone and Android Apps of the Year" by Healthline, voted "Top 10 apps for health and wellness" by Rewire Me and "One of 9 Funniest Android Apps of 2015 to keep you in good mood" by TechGYD, recommended by expert on Psychcentral.com and many other specialists. 

With iMoodJournal you can:
- Keep notes of your overall well-being with our colorful scale with editable mood labels. Record your thoughts and experiences.
- Setup automatic reminders ‚Äì as many as needed per day, even random! Now iMoodJournal will remind you when it's time to check in with yourself.
- Browse the history of your records using our engaging animated mood history chart.
- Establish associations between your mood and experiences by adding #hashtags to your records (yeah, like those in Twitter!).
- Mark your emotions, people surrounding you, any other objects or activities with #hashtags. Examples: #angry, #cheerful, #surprised, #friends, #workout. iMoodJournal will show you how your feelings and your surrounding affect your wellbeing in long term.
- Spot triggers of your mood changes on Top Positive and Negative #hashtags charts and filter your mood records by #hashtags.
- Take self-portrait photos and realize how your mood affects your appearance.
- Recognize time-based patterns in your mood on gorgeous summary charts, which include full mood history, as well as weekly and daily average charts.
- Share your mood with friends on Facebook.

WHEN DO I NEED A MOOD DIARY?

Mood diary is a tool frequently offered by psychologists and therapists to help us discover facts about ourselves that otherwise slip our attention. You may experience a serious diagnosed condition like bipolar, OCD or depression. You may have stressful job, like manager reporting to executives or customer facing specialist, which makes you feel exhausted at the end of your long day. You may be on emotional rollercoaster as your partner is making your heart tear apart. Or you may simply be curious to know yourself better. This app may help! Bring your iMoodJournal to your therapist or discuss it with your close friend to maximize its positive impact on your life.

* To get the best out of this app, please, keep regular records (preferably 2 ‚Äì 3 times a day) of your mood with tags and self-portraits for at least 1 ‚Äì 2 weeks. The Weekly Cycle chart requires several weeks of records to generate meaningful output. We wish you the very best experience with iMoodJournal. Please, send us your feedback at support@imoodjournal.com.

More about us: http://www.imoodjournal.com
Follow us on Twitter @iMoodJournal or find us on Facebook https://www.facebook.com/IMoodJournal/

comments: Love the simplicity and it lets me see patterns. I removed the labels to make it easier to go on 'gut feel'. I also set the colors to go from dark brown, lightbrown/yellow in the middle, to green at the top. To the devs, is there any way to clear old data (but keep recent history)? I took a year break and want to delete all my old history so I can see recent trends.

I've been using this app for about 2 months or so now and I really like it. However , there is some kind of bug happening right now; the app is not uploading new pictures for my entries, it replaced the selfie I took with a shot from 4 or 5 days ago. I've had the same picture log for the last 4-5 days, and that aspect is one of the reasons I love it so much. Now it seems to be useless. I've tried contacting for support via the website with no reply. Thanks!

This is ALMOST perfect. I love how I can set reminders throughout the day, because I forget keep up with mood journals most of the time. Overall, I really like the setup and interface. Definitely worth the purchase. The only problem I've experienced is that sometimes, if I accidentally touch near the back or done buttons, it'll save the unfinished portion, and I can't figure out how to edit it. I'm not even sure if there is an edit feature? That's the only reason I'm not giving 5 stars

Pretty good app to journal and track emotions, recommended to me by my therapist. A few suggestions: -Make good moods green and bad moods red. It doesn't make sense intuitively that an amazing mood would be bright red and an awful mood would be a positive green color. -Add option to add your own #emotions. Some of my emotions don't come up as default. -Timely reminders pop up at random times, do not follow times I had selected in app.

This app is missing several features listed on the app's website. Where's our calendar view, our templates, and charts setting? I bought the app in part for those features, so I'm disappointed that they aren't in the android version.

title: Pull the Pin
description:
In this game full of satisfying graphics and innovative levels, you can challenge yourself, your brain, and your friends! It‚Äôs you against physics and the tricky levels ‚Äî WHO WILL WIN?

All balls have to go into the pipe ‚Ä¶ can you remove the pins in the right order and make it happen?

It should be simple: gravity pulls the balls down towards the pipe. But then pins are in the way! Can you help out and flip away the pins and get the balls to where they are supposed to be?

But wait: there is another level of trickery! Sometimes some of the balls are colorless: before they go into the pipe, they need to touch a color ball, so the color spreads to them as well. So simple yet so tricky!
descriptionHTML:
In this game full of satisfying graphics and innovative levels, you can challenge yourself, your brain, and your friends! It‚Äôs you against physics and the tricky levels ‚Äî WHO WILL WIN?

All balls have to go into the pipe ‚Ä¶ can you remove the pins in the right order and make it happen?

It should be simple: gravity pulls the balls down towards the pipe. But then pins are in the way! Can you help out and flip away the pins and get the balls to where they are supposed to be?

But wait: there is another level of trickery! Sometimes some of the balls are colorless: before they go into the pipe, they need to touch a color ball, so the color spreads to them as well. So simple yet so tricky!
summary: Can you reach the pinnacle?
developerAddress:
Rheinsbergerstrasse76/77
10115 Berlin
Deutschland
recentChanges: Bug fixes + performance improvements. Thank you for playing!
comments: The first problem is the puzzles are far too simplistic to be entertaining. Finishing them does not provide any kind of sense of accomplishment. The biggest problem is that this is another app that exists as an engine to vomit ads at you that stop any media currently playing. Listening to a podcast? Not when one of these ads starts. And there are so many of them. Fail the puzzle? Here's an ad. Did you win? Congratulations here's an ad. In 10 minutes if game I spent over 5 of it watching ads.

Very easy, mindless game. Very little skill required. Has a lot of noisy adds, many with no volume off button, so don't play at work for a mindless break. Many adverts crash the game, resulting in having to replay the last round. I've lost interest now. Levels never get hard, & repeat earlier rounds. Boring.

A Little bit inane. Not much difficulty @ higher levels. It took abiut 15 minutes to reach level 45. Most of the time was taken up by adverts for other games. Realising it is your bread and butter to have a multitude of games available, and being played, with adverts inserted from time to time, but not at every level change whilst progressing through the game. I suggest (example) don't attempt or try to get people to role play, when they are playing logic or puzzle games.

This game has a lot of potential, unfortunately that potential is negated by the total overuse of advertisements, a level taking 5 seconds is then followed by up to 40 seconds of advertisements... deleted, Yes I understand the manufacturers of the game have to make a living and advertisements is their way of doing so, but taking the fun out of the game is not the way forwardüò•

Do you like puzzles that are very, very, very simple? Do you like spending lots of your time watching ads? If so, this might be the app for you. I actually find that I do play it from time to time. Sometimes I'm just in the mood for mindless winning with no effort. The game eagerly congratulates you after every simple win. I'm on level 353 now, so obviously I've spent some time playing it. It doesn't get any harder. A couple of the last few levels I played were literally un-losable.

title: HEIR OF LIGHT
description:
A Dark Fantasy Collectible RPG

Darkness has overtaken the realm, and the world is in chaos. The only hope to restore light and order lies with you, an Heir of Light. Embark on a crusade to renew a hope that has been lost for generations. Ready your weapon and journey to restore the light of the world!

[Features]

‚ñ† Be A Light in the Darkness
- Shine light upon a world shrouded in darkness. The war will only end when light shines upon every inch of the land.
- Expand the territory in any direction you desire!
- Mobs are no longer in your way, Exclusive Boss Battles Only!

‚ñ† Collect Powerful Servants
- Summon powerful Servants to fight at your side.
- Form your Crusade from among over 350 Servants.
- Enhance, Evolve, and Awaken to unlock their true potential.
- Diverse Roles for each Servant: Attack, Defense, Support, Healer.

‚ñ† Devise and Strategize
- Your Servants are the key of your Crusade, customize their Skills for every battle.

summary:
THE NEW GAME Update
Get a ToG Servant, 100M Gold, and five 5-star Summon Stones!
developerAddress: 131, Gasan digital 1-ro, Geumcheon-gu, Seoul, Republic of Korea
contentRatingDescription: Violence, Blood, Suggestive Themes, Partial Nudity
recentChanges:
[v5.0 Update Details]
- Heir of Light x Tower of God Collab Event
- Added "Skip" function in Explore and Dungeons
- Added "Craft Gear"
- New Avatars for Blavatsky, Caesar, and Teresia
comments: Update 5.0 replaced most battles with "skips". Turn the game on, Skip 700 battles, auto-pvp for 10 times in 2 modes, turn it off. As for guild war, the same pay-to-win guild has been #1 since the game's launch. The devs really need to balance things so other people have some chance. Anyone who tries their best to get that gw win just once will be sorely disappointed and might as well go play something else. Same people are always #1 in all other modes too. It's a joke.

Played this game for a couple of years. It was fun! But, I slowly saw it go from time2win to pay2win. I used to just let my phone run so I could grind the best 6 star armour. Every now and then they have specialty characters I would purchase for a couple of bucks. Nothing expensive though. But now I can't even fight bosses w/o paying for a "skip" token? I can't even get the option to choose valor like I did before! Welp, guess it's time to move on to another mobile game.

I really enjoyed this game for several months and it was the only one of these types of games I spent money on. it has been a generous game and the one experience i had with customer service was good. The latest patch however 5.0 i think, was a disappointment. It took the fun out of it for me. Adding new features is generally a positive, but not when you overwrite other features. It made it ungrindable. I haven't really been interested to play after trying the new update.

With the new update you really don't have the chance to play ,the skip system won't let you see how your heirs are doing in the dungeon because don't allow to see the fights so if you don't see the fights how you gonna chose the heir that fit you . I consider the developers need to give us the option to chose between skip and use valors. Thanks

Don't bother with this game, you'll soon realize you can't keep up as a f2p player. New unit every other month that is broken so they can release the next one to control it, rinse and repeat since the beginning if the game. Now with 5.0 update they completely gutted the game of what made it unique. Add in the worst type of content in gacha: gear/rune crafting. Materials for this type of content dominate drops from gear/rune dungeons, crafted gears/runes are notoriously worse than farmed version

title: Daily Yoga - Yoga Fitness Plans
description:
We‚Äôre here for you! Daily Yoga opens a Free Collection for you to provide 6 programs and 13 sessions free to everyone, plus the up to 80% Special Off of subscription. We hope to help users to stay safe and keep positive during the uncertain time!

If you're a beginner to yoga, Daily Yoga App provides various guided classes to help you learn the basics before diving into more advanced classes and flows, and if you're advanced‚Äîthere are plenty of the world - class teachers you want to follow with.		

Featured as ‚ÄúWorks with Google Fit‚Äù,‚ÄúTop Developer‚Äù,‚ÄúClear Your MindÔºå Engage Your Body‚Äù, ‚ÄúKeep Calm & Carry On‚Äù in Google Play, 
Voted as‚Äù Best Yoga App‚Äù of the year 2016-2019 by Healthline, 
Awarded by The Wall Street Journal as the ‚Äú5 Addictive Fitness Apps‚Äù.

Various Classes Fit Your Goal‚Ä®
Daily Yoga offers 500+ asanas, 70+ yoga programs, 500+ guided yoga, pilates, meditation sessions plus the largest yoga pose library for man and woman that suit yogis from beginner to advanced. Not only helps you stay with yoga every day, but also provides health benefits for both your mind and body.

Follow the World-Class Master
Altogether 20 yoga masters who are globally respected or the initiator of yoga styles focus on yoga for weight loss, beginner to advanced, better sleep & full relax. Aim to make it easier & convenient to yoga workout and provide programs that align with your current goals. All sessions are taught in English. 

Motivated by Community
The community in Daily Yoga App brings yogis from all over the world closer to one another. Yogis gather here to discuss their practicing experience under the topics, tag and encourage each other to finish the challenge, follow the Yoga Tips to improve their techniques, prepare the weight-control meals according to the selected recipes. Never feel lonely, and become more limber with other motivated yogis around you.

Create Private Yoga Plan
Don‚Äôt like to choose  the default plan? You can create yours. Private Yoga plan is a cycle of 7 days. Set the workout days and rest days according to your own schedule. Then you can combine yoga sessions to each workout day according to your need. If you know your body well, please give it a try to make your workout more efficient.

Adjust to Your Habits¬†
Multiple choices for session duration varied from 5 - 70 minutes to fit your schedule, and 7 languages available worldwide (English, Japanese, Korean, Spanish, Chinese, German, French). Support for Dark Mode to help to prevent eye strain.

Track Your Activity
Personal data from various devices can be tracked in App. With smart watch, you can track your exercise duration and calories burned and heart rate to contribute to your activity rings and meet your daily goals.

While you are waiting for the update to install, try this easy abdominal breathing: draw your abdomen inward to stabilise your core. As you inhale, bring your fingertips to touch in front of the belly. As you exhale, open your hands out to the sides. Inhale the future, exhale the past. Have fun with it!‚Ä®

Find out even more at http://www.dailyyoga.com;
Contact:
Email: support@dailyyoga.com
Instagram: @DailyYogaApp
Facebook: facebook.com/DailyYogaApp

Privacy Policy: http://www.dailyyoga.com/privacy.html 
Terms of Service: http://www.dailyyoga.com/terms.html

summary: Editor's Choice: Master All Basics of Yoga in Two Weeks & Get Fitter Everyday
developer: Hong Kong Daily Yoga Culture Technology., Limited
developerAddress:
Room 3306-12, 33/F, Shui On Centre
6-8 Hong Kong Road
Wanchai, Hong Kong
recentChanges:
You can enjoy the new Smart Coach now, with 7 categories and over 400 sessions waiting for serving your personal preference.
1. SCHEDULE supports the retake of missed sessions in history now. Try and get more circles.
2. Another upgrade! Tap the screen to check the pose list while exercising. It's much easier to browse and switch poses now.
3. New Courses in November: Winter Energy Flow-Intermediate Element Yoga, Easy Morning Yoga.
Monthly Golden Day, Thanksgiving, and Black Friday are coming!
comments: I keep using the app often. However, it has many bugs to be fixed. The smart coach shows sessions I did as not done. The time is off by a day so I cannot start my training at the correct day. The contact link connects to a share experience link instead. So how to contact you directly? Navigation through the app is not intuitive and it is congested with a lot of ballast. I'd appreciate very much a simplified version that is more straightforward to use.

Smart Coach was available for silver members. Now they have changed it only for gold members. It is like changing the game rules during the game. May be they will take away other things!!! Very poor taste of business. Although I love the app, I am thinking of switching to the other app just for this reason. Lack of business ethics, and in a yoga app. Another issue with the program. Now they have created a schedule to schedule a program. But there is no reschedule option for the missed days. üò≠

The programs and variety are good, but the app is bad. Buggy, and the material you want to get to - ie sessions - is difficult to get to. Constant ads and notifications you can't turn off, even with the Gold subscription, and the support staff's response is either ignoring criticism or suggesting you delete your account. Would suggest looking elsewhere.

This is the best yoga app I have ever tried and worth every penny if you choose to become a gold member. I tested it for a while now. I get usually bored easily with the same routine and this provides loads of options including levels, specific needs, length, time of day, goals,... The list is long and easy to organize with favorites and home page featured workouts. I will be renewing my subscription for sure!

This was my very first time trying yoga, and this was my first session... as a beginner I think it went pretty well. Could really feel my muscles stretching on some of those poses. But I was afraid I wasn't going to hear what the pose was correctly so I tried to keep my phone within eyesight so I could watch the instructor, but I think once I get the hang of it I won't need to look at my phone anymore and I can concentrate more on my poses.

summary: Become aware about yourself. Do simple short tests to diagnose yourself.
recentChanges: added new tests: eating disorder, gambling addiction, ptsd, serialkiller, workaholic
comments: I found these tests to be informative.

These "tests" are horribly flawed. For example, "neither in favor or opposed" is considered a moderately racist response to a question about a family member marrying someone of another race. That's wrong. It's not racist to not care about the race of a family member's spouse. Whoever made this is an idiot.
Very basic (not detailed). Not much help. Could have figured all this on my own, which I have.
These  are not even close to accurate at all. lol!
The tests are really rude and mean and it is like cyberbullying

title: Zillow: Find Houses for Sale & Apartments for Rent
description:
Take control of your next move with the Zillow app. Our best-in-class features help you unlock life‚Äôs next chapter by getting into a home you love. 

BUY A HOME ‚Äì Find your place with immersive photos, virtual tours, and the most listings, including things you won‚Äôt find anywhere else.

SELL A HOME ‚Äì Whether you sell directly to Zillow with Zillow Offers‚Ñ¢ or take a traditional approach, we‚Äôll help you navigate the path to a successful sale.

RENT A HOME ‚Äì From shopping on the largest rental network to automating applications, we‚Äôve created a seamless online experience for renters.

The Zillow app gives you resources and tools you won‚Äôt find anywhere else, so you can shop smarter for your next home:

‚Ä¢ The most listings and constant updates so you never miss out¬π
‚Ä¢ 3D Home Tours so you can picture yourself in a home and narrow down which houses to visit in person 
‚Ä¢ Self Tour for Zillow-owned homes, with no appointment and no pressure. Stop by when it‚Äôs convenient and unlock the door with the app
‚Ä¢ Zestimate¬Æ, the industry-leading independent home valuation tool, calculated daily
‚Ä¢ Robust filters for school districts, views, pricing, pets, HOAs, and more
‚Ä¢ Easier co-shopping: Tag your favorite home features and share your favorites to coordinate your search with a partner or roommate
‚Ä¢ Push notifications to let you know when houses come to market, have a sale pending, or drop in price 
‚Ä¢ Neighborhood details including restaurants, grocery stores, parks, and coffee shops
‚Ä¢ Easy access to Zillow Premier Agents, local real estate experts who meet Zillow‚Äôs bar for quality customer service
‚Ä¢ All the pricing and details you need to compare homes & apartments for rent 
‚Ä¢ A personal renter profile so you can visit a house rental and engage directly with potential landlords and property managers who rent homes

1. Most listing based on direct site comparisons

summary: Buy Homes, Rent Apartments & Sell Real Estate: Open Houses & Homes for Rent
developerAddress:
1301 Second Avenue, Floor 31,
Seattle, WA 98101
recentChanges: We are always working hard to improve our apps. This is a small update to fix a few bugs. Please continue to send your feedback to androidfeedback@zillow.com. We appreciate it.
comments: Its ok. Its best for home window shopping. If you're seriously looking, it's less convenient. It assumes how much you're going to put down and what interest rate you've been approved for. There's no way to set those things so it gives you a more accurate idea of what you're paying each month. Plus, in my area theres a lot of 55+ communities and theres no way to filter those out, which is irritating.

I like this app, overall, but would really love to have the ability to hide or dismiss a property from my search, if it's not one that meets my needs. I like that I can save homes, but when searching later, homes keep popping up that I would rather not look at again! Also, if there is a way to get HOA/Space rent to be mandatory when there is one for the property, that would be great. I've looked at many that stated there was none, but that wasn't true. Thanks!

Zillow gave the option to turn off cookies, but did not bother to mention that it will erase all of your data when you do this. I went ahead and typed everything in once again, and it erased it AGAIN. Also, you can't add photos, videos, or tours with any Android phone -only i0s I want to know what kind of incentive apple is giving developers to leave these flaws in their designs..

I use this app almost daily, it keeps me up to date on homes that I am very interested in. We will be buying or building in the next 5 months, we are looking forward to building or buying our dream home. I love Zillow, I have found it to be more up to date than a Real Estate office. I highly recommend Zillow. Thank you, carolintallahassee

While the interface is the best I've seen out of all the other real estate options, the information is not accurate or up to date. If you try to get information from the listing agent on the app, a third party starts messaging you and sending your information to unrelated agents. I simply messaged asking about an open house and some random dude was trying to get me a new buyer's agent even though I already have one.

‚òÖ App Advisor powered by Norton‚Ñ¢ Mobile Insight, automatically checks apps for potential privacy risks, high battery and data usage or intrusive behavior before download. [3]

‚òÖ WiFi Security helps your device stay safe when connecting to public Wi-Fi. Wi-Fi Security alerts if an unknown party on the same Wi-Fi network is spying on your online activity, known as a man-in-the-middle (MITM) attacks.

comments: Look. It works and is effective. However. For the sake of going in educated, know that if you don't know how to unsubscribe via Google Play, Norton is going to make finding out a bad time. They deliberately force you to make an account, force you to share details to contact support, and deliberately provide no information on how to unsubscribe from the service. That type of behavior says a LOT about the ethics of a company. Be aware before making a commitment.

I mainly got this Norton app for the excellent call blocking features... everything else was just a plus. Now, a message on the app indicates the call blocking feature will be discontinued in a future update so that Norton can add some "exciting new features." Nothing could be exciting enough without being able to block calls! I'll finish out the year I paid for and then move to something else....for free!

I have never had the real time fraud and spam call alerts since I've installed the Norton 360 app, I wish it would block telemarketers and robocalls, not only in the calling but also in the messaging. I'm forever getting calls from what I know I've reported to the blocking app, which I have to manually put in the blocking app. I love the safe search feature, I love the play store features that works you of an unsafe app before you download it. I love so far the identity safe features also.

Perfect Mix of Mobile Security & Antivirus Combo For Galaxy Note 4 Running On Android 6.0.1 Everything seems to run well with no issues. I think I'll stick with this current updated version 4.8.0 on my phone since updating to much further might start to have a negative effects on my old operating system. Keep up the good work.üëà

LOUSY! VPN constantly has to be logged into over & over ... AND the app doesn't recognize login info so you are returned to the login screen. The antivirus can be running at the same time but the VPN is a separate app. Very poor design. Added 10/29/20 - just rec'd notice Norton is removing Call Block feature. RUFKM?? That's one of the MOST important features!! Time to find a BETTER security app. Sorry Norton. Your app is not worth the cost anymore.

title: Cognitive Behavioral Therapy - Tips
description:
¬†
You may find techniques to introspect mental disorders and evidence-based information about emotional problems and mental disorders. It will also teach you how to test yourself for psychological problems. By identifying your problems, you can bring discipline in your life.
¬†
Cognitive Behavioral Therapy does not exist as a distinct therapeutic technique. The term "Cognitive Behavioral Therapy" is a very general term for a classification of therapies with similarities. There are several approaches to cognitive behavioral therapy, including Rational Emotive Behavior Therapy.
¬†
Cognitive behavioral therapy is an approach used by psychotherapists to influence a patient's behaviors and emotions. The key to the approach is in its procedure which must be systematic. It has been used successfully to treat a variety of disorders including eating disorders, substance abuse, anxiety and personality disorders. It can be used in individual or group therapy sessions and the approach can also be geared towards self help therapy.‚Ä®‚Ä®
¬†
The effectiveness of the treatment can clearly be judged based on its results. The more it is used, the more it has become recommended. It is now used as the number one treatment technique for post traumatic stress disorder, obsessive compulsive disorder, depression and bulimia.
¬†
CBT is effective for a variety of conditions, including mood, anxiety, personality, eating, addiction, dependence, tic, and psychotic disorders. Many CBT treatment programs have been evaluated for symptom-based diagnoses and been favored over approaches such as psychodynamic treatments. However, other researchers have questioned the validity of such claims to superiority over other treatments. your knowledge, widen your expertise, improve your practice skills, Broaden your academic & career horizons.
¬†
¬†
¬†
* Topic Covers in app are:
¬†
- What is Cognitive Behavior Therapy
- What is Cognitive-Behavioral Therapy (CBT)
- At-home Cognitive Behavioral Therapy for Anxiety‚Ä®
- Learn about Cognitive Behavioral Therapy and Therapists‚Ä®
- Cognitive Behavioral Therapy for Insomnia
- What Is Cognitive Behavioral Therapy?
- Cognitive Behavioral Activities‚Ä®.
- Essential Cognitive Behavioral Therapy Techniques.
¬†

* Features:
¬†
- Periodic update of content‚Ä®
- Support Offline Database ‚Ä®
- You can ask questions from our experts‚Ä®.
- Send us your suggestions and we will add it.
¬†

title: SoloLearn: Learn to Code for Free
description:
SoloLearn has the largest collection of FREE code learning content, from beginner to pro! Choose from thousands of programming topics to learn coding concepts, brush up your programming knowledge, or stay aligned with the latest coding trends.

You will be greeted by the friendliest community of coders, where peer support is an essential part of learning and development.  Fresh learning content is created by the community daily, facilitating efficient and effective coder skill improvement.  

Join millions of other coders for anytime anywhere access to countless coding topics and assignments. Write and run real code in our mobile code editor, get inspired through real-life code samples, and engage in interactive community conversations along the way. 

 ‚Ä¢ Google Play's Editor's Choice 

 ‚Ä¢ "SoloLearn has done a beautiful job creating a mobile learning experience that combines personal accomplishment with a community engagement." - Facebook's FbStart App of the Year Judge

 ‚Ä¢ "[Aimed] at "millennials" and students who want a simpler way to learn." - TechCrunch

 ‚Ä¢ "There are hundreds of different quizzes and activities in the code playground section to keep practicing." - Forbes

 ‚Ä¢ ‚ÄúSoloLearn aims to make it easier by breaking down programming concepts into quick, digestible daily lessons." - Lifehacker

PERSONALIZED. Content is delivered based on your progress, preference, and hottest market trends.

comments: I am very new to conding. I love the step by step, move at your own pace format. My only gripe so far. Is that, the only time you pactice coding is when you fill in the blanks. I think it would be better, if the lessons allowed you to copy the code and type it as program are constructed. instead of allowing you to run the code that has already been typed for you. I think I would remember better. If I had done it myself.

SoloLearn is a great study tool for me because it explains concepts in a way that is easy for me to follow and helps me prepare for exams. I also enjoy using it as a tool to help me get ahead in my classes and ensure that I understand the different constraints of programming languages, as well as how they can be used.

This app is Excellent in the ways which it provides a great spectrum on all the programming languages and a coding playground whereby sololearn users can practice codes and execute source codes to get results. Go ahead and Try it for yourself, whether you have a knowledge in programming skills or a beginner in programmimg. I didnt know coding when i started and now I have basic knowledge on all the programming languages that are required for starting your own program.

I'm learning Python 3 really fast! If you honestly want to learn how to code, and you like the idea of tests and interactive lessons, this is definitely the app for you. Sometimes, you can slip off, I get that feeling as it has happened to me before, but if you invest enough time while you're interested, you might just learn enough before the shut down!

Many languages to choose from, but only one lesson for free and you market as a free to learn app is kind of misleading. Also if you're wondering why not a lot of people are learning code is because apps like this one become to expensive to use. It's not a free to use app unless all lessons are free. Other than that I don't know what you're learning because you can't do anything with just variables. Not a lot of people want to learn code because they have to pay.

title: Stop - Categories Word Game
description:
Stop is a fun and clever turn based game you play with friends. 

Randomly select a letter to start and type a word for each of the 5 different categories that starts with that letter. The player that gets most correct words in the least amount of time wins!


Features:

- Turn based, fast paced word game
- Go head to head with your friends on Facebook and Game Center
- Unlimited fun with challenging categories to choose from
- Achievements to unlock and conquer the game
- Learn a new language! Play in English, Spanish, French, German, Italian and Brazilian Portuguese

Start playing Stop!

Tune in at www.facebook.com/stopbyfanatee

comments: Only 3 stars because I quite enjoy the game, there are alot of ads which I can deal with however you dont get enough lives so you're basically waiting and hoping that the other player hasnt put their phone down so you can play for longer than 5 minutes. My suggestion is either add more lives, or cut down the time to wait for lives. If its going to be a half hour wait to get 1 life, it's not worth my time when I use all 3 in 5-10 minutes.

This is a super great innovative game. I love it. I have always loved the paper version, but to find an app version, this is great. Thank you developers and all who worked hard to make this app possible- From the little guys who are hardly recognized to the CEO or whatever you call your top people.

The game itself is fun! It would be great to have a way to leave comments to your opponent. Some people leave hilarious answers. But the ads are offensive and obnoxious. I understand the need to have ads to support the business, and that I could just pay $3 to remove them. Just beware if your kids want to download it, some of the ads are Rated R.

I REALLY love this game. It's super fast paced, makes me think and I really enjoy the premise of it. However the ads are absolutely terrible. They are constant and long and I know I will soon stop playing the game because of it
The game is fun but very repetitive but it's whatever. I hate how many ads there are and the amount of time they need to run before you can exit out from them.

title: Dollify
description:
Hi peeps! I'm @dave.xp and I can't wait for you to make your own portraits!

Me and the developer team have carefully crafted this app so you can make the cutest looking avatars on the internet!

It's very easy to use and you'll get the most beautiful results by just picking your favourite items out of 14 different categories. 

With many different items to choose from and their color variations, you can make thousands of unique combinations and I can't wait to see yours!

Tag your portraits with the hashtag #dollifyapp and I'll be featuring some of them every week on my Instagram account! 

Cheers
Dave XP

comments: I gave this game 3 stars! I love this game so much but... When I updated the game, all my dolls dissapered! I got really sad and angry. I wish I never updated the game. By the way I have some suggestions that you can add into the game: 1: When you update the game, you don't lose all yours dolls. 2: Add more outfits for the girls. 3: For the black eye color it should be darker. I love this game soo much. Thanks for making this game. I REALLY enjoy it!

I love this game. It helps you be creative and choose who you want to create. People without premium get to have a challange were they get to use items that arent premium. I also love this game because it brought me closer to my friends that don't live near me and they end up installing the app. One thing i would like to add would be like hats or bows so you can have things in your hair without paying for premium. I hope this helps everyone that reads this. Thank you for making this game. üòä

5/5 Stars!! I love this game so much! It's a great way to make avatars and you could even make your self and, try out different looks! There is minimal ads but, there could be a spin wheel that you can watch ads to spin and get like a daily spin to earn coins. You could then use those coins to unlock some of the locked items just for 1 or 2 uses. Mainly because some of the best items are locked and only for premium users. Other than that love this game and 10/10 recommend!!

Very fun, adorable avatars, and I love the hairstyles and the fact you can layer the clothes, only one thing, this is just extra kind of feedback, maybe add a few more things, but overall it is amazing! Also it's not even that, that is the only thing I would say about improving this app! Super fun, and the fact you've included masks is another great feature, and shows your respect and seriousness towards the pandemic. Great job!

This is a really great game. I personally think that you could add a new option for creating dolls (full body option) Aswell as this, you could also add some cool postitions for your doll to pose in, this way when you save your dolls they will be in a cool position and you can also see there legs aswell. Other than this, this is one of my favorite games to play. üëçüèª

title: News Break: Local Breaking Stories & US Headlines
description:
Local headlines and breaking news ‚Äì get your local news, crime updates,  results and coverage, sports updates and U.S. headlines straight to your phone, with News Break.

Connect with your local community and follow U.S. headlines such as the local news, sports events, lifestyle stories, and even crime updates and traffic. News Break is personalized to your interests, likes and dislikes, so you‚Äôll always get relevant stories that really matter to you.

News Break helps people live safer, more vibrant, more truly connected lives. Whether it‚Äôs your local sports team, lifestyle tips, local headlines, breaking stories, U.S. news and updates ‚Äì you can access local, relevant stories and world news with just a tap.

U.S. News and Highlights

‚Ä¢ Get a curated daily brief focused on breaking stories, the U.S, local headlines, crime updates, traffic, events, sports updates and more U.S. news and local updates
‚Ä¢ Our intelligent local news platform aggregates rich, relevant stories from more than 10,000 trusted news outlets across the U.S.
‚Ä¢ Breaking news - be the first to know about breaking local news, U.S. headlines, world news and local updates

Local Updates: Know Your Town

‚Ä¢ Find local restaurants, local events, shop openings, traffic, breaking stories, and more ‚Äì all in a single app!
‚Ä¢ Read unique perspectives and personal stories from local writers and content creators
‚Ä¢ U.S. headlines, sports updates, lifestyle stories and local events - focus on the incredible things that are happening right where you live and work!

News Commentary: Express Yourself

‚Ä¢ Don‚Äôt just read the news, discuss it with other News Break readers!
‚Ä¢ News Break welcomes all respectful perspectives and points of view

Support the Cause

‚Ä¢ News Break is working hard to revive the local-news ecosystem by supporting small publishers around the U.S.
‚Ä¢ We‚Äôre activating legions of local bloggers and content creators ‚Äì people just like you ‚Äì that have important things to say about their communities. Join in and share your views & news!

What are you waiting for? Download News Break today and start living a safer, more vibrant, more connected life through the power of local news, U.S. news and information!

Your place for local updates, breaking stories and world news. News Break ‚Äì Better Informed, Better Life.

comments: It's a pretty nice app. Loads of information and tons of links. The guys are great. If they run across something that you like, they will email you or text ya. They we're just letting me know about Tom's Place. It's really good too. Kinda slow at times but it's not bad. I would definitely recommend üòä this app.

I am tired of this app crashing, repeatedly. I will be in the middle of an interesting article and the app closes and restarts. I even deleted it and reloaded it and it still happens. To make things worse, I can't always find the article I was reading again. Annoying. Update...Still happening. Still annoyed.

it is a nice site- if you're into everything - I initially downloaded for my breaking neighborhood news - tried to adjust the notifications level to no avail - it resets itself for push, for local, for comments. it slowly started to take up my whole screen with updates on the same story, with nothing new to report on. I had to uninstall. :( updated 10/31 - app send emails only now :) it seems as though it has improved and I look forward to reading the articles now.

I've been using News break for about a year now, and it's been informative and accurate in relating the news. I like this app mainly because if it's wide variety of topics and interest pieces. My news etc. is ALWAYS just a few inches from me. I don't have to go buy a newspaper for almost $2.00 everyday. I feel I get the news I need to keep me up to date between this app and watching Action news a couple times a day.

The developer needs to work on this site!!! They do not respond back, or even care about issues. It freezes up and sometimes takes 30 minutes to as you to "stop"/"wait" or "close out" by that time you are other places. They load too many ads for the screens and ones that take over the whole screen where you can not close out of,you have to leave the app, and come back never to read the article you were trying. The ADs do not format to fit the page right. I need more space here to address issues

title: Icing On The Cake
description:
From the makers of I Peel Good, Icing on the Cake is your next obsession. Put your cake decorating skills to the test! Relax and channel your inner baker in Icing on the Cake. So many fun pastries for you to rotate, pipe, decorate and smooth out? Can you make the perfect cake? Fun and easy to pick up but don‚Äôt miss a spot... Will you be the first one to finish them all?


Color and decorate the perfect wedding cake or birthday cake. The tasty end results will leave you feeling hungry for more! Any time is cake time.

Game Features:


1. Zen Out

Ice ice baby! Take your time and relax and create the perfect cake


2. Smooth Smooth Icing

The most realistic food simulation game there is. The realistic cakes will leave you hungry.


3. Bake ALL the cakes

Endless amount of cakes for you to ice and smooth. Can you put the icing on all of the cakes?


4. Feel the smooth

Play, relax, and feel satisfied with every cake you ice. Feel the realistic sensation of icing and spreading.


Whether you like icing, like smoothing or just want to spin and color, Icing on the Cake will take you there. This is the best and most zen cake simulation game there is. Good luck putting Icing on the Cake down!

title: Ball Sort Puzzle
description:
Ball Sort Puzzle is a fun and addictive puzzle game! Try to sort the colored balls in the tubes until all balls with the same color stay in the same tube. A challenging yet relaxing game to exercise your brain!

‚òÖ HOW TO PLAY:
‚Ä¢ Tap any tube to move the ball lie on top in the tube to another tube.
‚Ä¢ The rule is that you can only move a ball on top of another ball if both of them have the same color and the tube you want to move into has enough space.
‚Ä¢ Try not to get stuck - but don‚Äôt worry, you can always restart the level at any time.

‚òÖ FEATURES:
‚Ä¢ One finger control.
‚Ä¢ FREE & EASY TO PLAY.
‚Ä¢ NO penalty & time limit; you can enjoy Ball Sort Puzzle at your own pace!

‚òÖ NEED HELP? HAVE ANY QUESTIONS?
‚Ä¢ Support email: support@iecglobal.com.au

comments: Excellent game that makes your brain think, but not to the point where it is frustrating. To those complaining about the ads. either turn off your internet/data, or support the developers by purchasing their ad. free offer.

To play without ads, turn off your wifi and data; That being said, I would have given it a 5 as I used to REALLY enjoy this game, but as of today I do not. For whatever reason, it now removes and rearranges the tubes once you have filled a color. I do NOT like this, it is havoc on my brain/eyesight.

Great game. Loads of ads, so you'll need to pay to get rid of them. It is worth the free, however, you still have to watch ads when you get enough percentage to unlock the test tubes. Hence my lower star rating. Surely you should be able to unlock without watching adds when you've paid for no adds? Big downside!

Really nicely done. You'll usually have difficult levels interspaced with a few easy ones, so every time you pick it up you find the game challenging and rewarding, great flow. The sound effects are perfect too. Given the time it often takes to complete a level I don't find the ads too obtrusive either.

Too much irritating by ads, why don't you stop ads displaying on my screen. While I play this game to stop my mobile data button, is it ok for you. Try to imporve your game, I can't suggest to play this game to anyone of my friends & relatives. If in case iam going to suggest this game and they are all facing same problem like what Iam facing problem with this game. They all be√†t me very hard. Because this is too much irritating by ads playing between game to game. Can check it or not tell me.

title: Arm Workout - Biceps Exercise

Arm Workout, designed by professional fitness coaches, is created to help people around the world obtain stronger arms. It offers short and effective arm workouts for developing arm muscles.

With only 10 minutes a day, your biceps and triceps will be pumped up. No equipment needed, all workouts can be performed with your body weight at home.

Workout Plan with Different Levels

Exercise intensity increases gradually, so you can easily make exercising a daily habit. We strongly recommend you to follow our workout schedule for the best results.

title: Likee - Let You Shine

With the powerful personalized feed and video effects, you can easily find viral videos, capture flawless videos, watch and go live stream. It‚Äôs time to express yourself, show your talents, explore and connect with the content you love on Likee.

We have over 100 million users all around the world. More and more people choose Likee for fun, self-expression and friends making. Download and join Likee to discover a bigger world!

Why Likee?

A Popular Special Effects Short Video Maker and Editor
Various video effects, face filters and editing tools on Likee to help you make cool videos with little efforts. 

- SuperMix: enhance videos with cool special effects like Face Morph, Astral Travel, Face Cut and MV and more! A photo is all you need to make professional and fantastic videos.

title: Still | Anxiety Relief
description:
Still is designed to help you relieve symptoms of Anxiety and OCD.

Use targeted messages to help pull your focus out of your anxiety or OCD as well as breathing exercises, Still helps you avoid the worst of your condition and stop it from taking hold.

Use the SOS mode to choose an emergency contact you can quickly reach if you're struggling, without having to compose an SMS or search through your contacts.

title: Music Maker JAM - Song & Beatmaker app
description:
The simple, beat maker app. Music Maker JAM is an app for all music creators, whatever your level is. It‚Äôs easy to use: create or remix amazing beats and tracks using loops from a variety of genres including Trap, EDM, Hip-Hop, House, Pop, Rock, and more. Whether you‚Äôre a beat maker or someone who used to prefer a garage band, this is the perfect way to make music!

Music Maker JAM lets you unleash your creativity and musical skills. The possibilities are endless - check out the features available to users:

 Choose from over 300 Mix Packs with more than 500,000 loops to make music

Make it your style: Available genres include Trap, EDM, Hip-Hop, House, Pop, Rock, Dubstep, Jazz, Latin, Techno, DnB and many more - the possibilities are endless

You are the music producer: Record your tracks with a perfect mix on the 8-channel mixer, or just jam live for your friends at a party

Be creative: Change tempo and harmonies, arrange song parts and play around with spectacular real-time effects like reverb, stutter, delay, and more

Remix tracksby simply shaking your smartphone or tablet

Sing or rap on your tracks: record your voice and mix your vocals into your beats, then apply autotune like effects for ultimate results

title: Adobe Lightroom - Photo Editor & Pro Camera
description:
Adobe Photoshop Lightroom is a free, powerful photo editor and camera app that empowers your photography, helping you capture and edit stunning images.

Easy image editing tools like sliders and filters for pictures simplify photo editing. Retouch full-resolution photos, apply photo filters, or start photo editing wherever you are.

EDIT PHOTOS ANYWHERE
Transform raw photos with one of the world‚Äôs most intuitive photo editing apps. Tap and drag sliders to improve light and color, apply photo filters for pictures, and more. Breathe life into your photo editing with leading photography tools.

Retouch light and color to make photos pop. Easy sliders let you control photo properties from your phone screen.

Crop and Rotate tools find the right size and aspect ratio to best show off your camera work. Create clean shots with straight lines by adjusting the perspective with powerful upright, guided upright, and Geometry sliders. 

Experiment and compare different photo versions without losing the original and pick your favorite look.

Access all your presets anywhere. Image edits on one device are automatically applied everywhere else.

EDIT THE FINE DETAILS
Finesse details with the advanced picture editor. Control images with selective adjustments. Remove almost anything with a touch of the Healing Brush. Local Hue Adjustments as part of selective edits let you alter hue and saturation with precision and elevate your photos. Have more control with advanced color grading and achieve stunning effects. Import your own graphical watermarks and apply your personal touch.

Easy, interactive tutorials from fellow photographers teach you to use the photo editor to its potential.

LIGHTROOM PRESETS SIMPLIFY PHOTO EDITING:
Achieve professional photo editing faster with presets - filters for pictures with unlimited customization options. Presets make each step of photo editing visible so you can learn easily. 
Combine presets to recreate your favorite photo effects perfectly every time with one click.

PRO-LEVEL CAMERA
Unique phone camera controls unlock your photography potential. Choose exposure, timer, instant presets, raw and more. Enjoy more control over your photography with capture modes like Professional and HDR.

SMART PHOTO ORGANIZATION
Adobe Sensei harnesses the power of AI to tag and organize photos based on the objects or people that are in them. A quick search for ‚Äúmountains‚Äù or ‚ÄúMaria‚Äù will display all the relevant photos. Use handy organizational tools like ratings and flags to mark and group your favorite photos, and see suggestions for the best photos across all your albums.

ADVANCED PHOTO SHARING
Group Albums let you invite others and collect everyone‚Äôs photos in one place. Share your creative process with users in the Discover section so they can see how you got from start to finish. Lightroom galleries showcase your photos online. Photo edits sync seamlessly so any changes you make are always up-to-date. Get inspiration from other creatives in the Lightroom Community and see personalized content in your feed.

Follow your favorite contributors and get inspiration for your work.

EASY ADOBE CREATIVE CLOUD STORAGE:
The Lightroom image editor is the best cloud-based service for photography lovers.
Retouch full-resolution shots and have originals and edits backed up to the cloud, ready to access anywhere. Searchable keywords are automatically applied to help you sort photos without tagging.

*Full raw HDR capture mode is currently supported on devices that contain advanced processing and memory capabilities including but not limited to devices such as - Samsung S7, S7 Edge, S8, S8+, Note 8, Google Pixel, Pixel XL, Pixel 2, Pixel 2 XL, Pixel 3, Pixel 3 XL, and OnePlus 5.

Fine Print
You must be 13 or older and agree to Adobe‚Äôs terms and privacy policy:
http://www.adobe.com/go/terms_linkfree
http://www.adobe.com/go/privacy_policy_linkfree
Do Not Sell My Information: https://www.adobe.com/privacy/ca-rights.html

recentChanges:
- Color Grading: New creative control of midtones, highlights, and shadows
- Auto Versions: Versions created automatically as you edit
- Graphical Watermarks: Apply graphical watermark to your photos
- Follow Authors: Follow your favorite photographers to get quick access to their tutorials

comments: Mostly docking points for the system integration (which is classic Adobe arrogance imo). If I could open images directly from the gallery (etc), it would be much more efficient. As-is I have to add it to "All Photos" (no other options), open the app manually, open the folder, find the image, and then I can start editing it. Also, while I like the new UI, it took me a bit to find everything. It's not visually obvious that you can swipe the toolbars for one thing.

AVOID AVOID AVOID AVOID!!! - I have been using this PAID product for over a month and have experienced nothing but persistent crashes.It cant even do an export to JPG without crashing. I have sent numerous reports to Adobe, but nothing has been done. So disappointing, as the product has some good features, but is totally overshadowed by instability issues and the fact Adobe charge you monthly for the pleasure. Maybe it works OK for other platforms, but for Android its a car crash. I've cancelled my subscription and uninstalled. On the look out for a professional product that allows you to edit/save work.

Needs a way to allow the theme to be changed from dark to light. Poor choice of text color for files uploading count. Needs a way to get a list of the files claimed to be uploading which never seem to finish! Always hangs on uploads. Syncing fails on a regular basis to LR Classic. Camera only uses some of the lenses on my LG V40 using Android V10.

A great app I have yet to try the paid version. It does almost anything you want it to. I do have a minor complaint. I use this on my android tablet usually and I wish there were ambidextrous controls. I use my pen a lot and it's very difficult to tune the color and lighting which are all on the right side as a left handed person.

I'm blown away by how much you can do with the free version. It seems a little complicated at first but the more time yo give it the more you learn and the more you realize this is probably the best free editing app available on your phone. Have so many lessons available aswell. Honestly excited about any new updates.

title: Mubeat for KPOP Lovers
description:
Mubeat for KPOP Lovers!
Mubeat is a platform just for KPOP fans all over the world to fan out to their favorite idols.

*Watching [Stream HD Videos of Your Artist]
-Videos from the past to the latest videos of your bias! Binge-watch music shows, variety shows, MVs, Mubeat original content clips in HD!

*Voting [Gift a 1st Place Spot to Your Artist]
-Fans all over the world can now participate in voting for not only the 1st place winner of Korean music show programs like Show! Music Core etc, but also vote on various contents in Mubeat Voting and vote to win the benefit of THE SHOW TV spot ad!

*Supporting [Celebrate Artist's Anniversary]
-Celebrate your artist's anniversary with other fans with Mubeat Fandom Ads through subway ads, rewarded video fandom ads, and more!

*Talking [Interact with Global KPOP Fans]
-Share artist's info and how you fan out to your favorite artist in the Community and interact with global fans!

[Main Functions]

üì∫ Your Very Own Hideout [Artist Channel]

Watch HD videos of your favorite artists like BTS, BLACKPINK, TWICE, Stray Kids, TXT, (G)I-DLE, SEVENTEEN, ATEEZ, ITZY, NCT, GOT7, etc, conveniently all in one place!
[Artist Channel] Follow artists and receive notifications on their latest ‚ú®HD KPOP‚ú® videos from various Korean TV channels!
From Focused CAMs, official MVs, music and variety shows from various Korean TV channels to Mubeat's original content videos~
Organized according to albums/members for your convenience!
Enjoy all these for free!

üí• Show Off the Power of Fandoms! [Voting]

‚úîÔ∏èShow! Music Core Global Voting- Fans all over the world, pre-vote in Show! Music Core Global Voting and gift your artist a 1st place spot!
‚úîÔ∏èMubeat Voting- Participate in superfun, Mubeat-exclusive content votings, and win a ton of benefits!
‚úîÔ∏èMubeat I.Q Voting- The artist I picked is going to answer my question? Get one step closer to your artist by voting for the artist you want to have a QnA with!

üéâTake Charge of Your Artist's Anniversary! [Mubeat Fandom Ads]

Birthdays, debut anniversaries, comebacks, and more. Celebrate these special anniversaries of your artist!
Various types of ads such as subway ads, rewarded video fandom ads and more are available to help make it an unforgettable day for your artist.

üó£ Shortcut to Becoming a True Fan [Artist Community]

Express and share your love for your bias with global KPOP fans who share the same interests as you. Because the more you share, the bigger the love grows!

üìà For the Real Fans [Mubeat Charts]

Stream your favorite artist's videos now and raise their chart rank. Video views are not only reflected in Mubeat Charts (real time), but also on Gaon Social Chart 2.0.

*Other Functions for Your Convenience

Subtitles, Vertical Screen Mode, Mini Player, Video Download, Full HD Videos, Voting Display Board Ad, Wall, KPOP Quiz, and more.

[Mubeat+ Benefits]

‚Ä¢ Unlimited Ad-Free KPOP Video Streaming
‚Ä¢ Unlimited Video Download
‚Ä¢ Other Device Connections on TV, etc

* Customer Service
If you are experiencing any issues or inquiries while using the app, please send to support@mubeat.tv.

*Get Closer with Mubeat!
-Official Website: https://www.mubeat.tv/
-Official Facebook: @mubeatTV
-Official Twitter: @MubeatTV
-Official Youtube: mubeatTV
-Official Instagram: @mubeat_kpop

comments: It used to be the easiest voting app to watch ads from but the latest update is so frustrating. Why did they put 24-hour reset time? It's not everyday that we get free time during a certain hour. Say I've watched the first ad at 4pm today since I have a free time. Why do I have to wait until 4pm tomorrow to start watching ads again? I mean, it really lost its convenience. Please bring the reset time to 00:00 KST. It works well for everyone that way. Until then, I can only give one star.

I think this apps become worse after the latest update. I can't watch the ads even after 24 hours and the ads keeps unavailable. The worse is the notification said that I already reached my limit of watching ads when I did not even watch any. Please give back the old version since I did not have any problems with it before.

This is the most satisfying and smoothiest kpop based app I ever downloaded. It's actually my favorite kpop app like it's easy to watch ads and very easy to use. BUT! Please do something about video viewing here in the Philippines. I want to make the most of this app. Please do something about it... [EDIT: OCTOBER] Thank you very much for continuing the video viewing here in the Philippines! +üåü! And also the new update is truly the best! Thank you for always providing the best service possible

This is a great application before something went wrong, I can't watch my ads anymore, it's always says "There aren't ads available at this moment. Please try again later" even tho I didn't watch any ads today and the ads sign is still 0/15, please fix this problem, as soon as possible.

Normally I use the app while connected to WiFi but today I used data and when I opened the app all my account details were gone even my beats, I had to create another mubeat account which I did not like at all. The app worked great at first but now I don't know what is wrong with it. Please fix the app. (Edit: Thank you for responding, I have sent all the details you asked for and I hope my account will be retrieved soon )

title: Foil Turning 3D
description:
Oh, sooo shiny‚Ä¶but what could it be? Create unique masterpieces from foil in Foil Turning 3D!

Hammer? Check. Foil? Check. Then it‚Äôs time to create.

Here‚Äôs how to play:
1. Grab the foil and mold it into fantastic shapes using that mallet.
2. Got what you want? Great! Now it‚Äôs time to get polishing. No one likes rough edges, after all. Sand it down so that it‚Äôs nice and smooth. Good job!
3. Now, time to paint it. What‚Äôs life without a little color, after all? Choose between reds, blues, purples, and more.

And you‚Äôre done! Now it‚Äôs time to sit back and enjoy your creation.

Download Foil Turning 3D today and enjoy a creative and relaxing game at your fingertips.
