recentChanges: ‚Äî Various bug fixes and improvements.
comments: Had a problem with subscription features that as far as I know, cleared itself up (no support, clearing the cache didn't work. Did that, uninstalled and reinstalled and ensured I was logged into the correct account. Gave up, came back to the app a day later and was able to use HD features and all filters). It took a little less than support to respond, so that was good considering this is an app where you shouldn't run into many issues. Only issue, reorganizing your filter collection is a pain

Used to be good but the quality fell, the filters aren't as good as they used to be, it is slow, and it suddenly became a subscription thing. There are very few filters, and the advert for the subscription or the free day trial keeps popping up every other moment. The few free filters are low quality and there doesn't appear to be many locked ones, so doesn't seem worth the money. Am very disappointed.

The photo styles are great and I like that there is a choice of SD or HD, and that a variety of settings can be modified with the ease of a slider, however, the styles themselves are limited and there doesn't appear to be a way to include more (either as a freebie or paid). As much as I'm enjoying it, I don't see myself using it even the full year with that limitation. I'm on the fence as to whether it's worth the yearly cost. I have photoshop on my desktop; I'd be better off with that.

amazing array of effects. totally engaging. few options that I wish were there: 1. search or filter effects based on criteria. Considering there are so many effects, searching through them to find the right one is time consuming. I wish they were sorted in categories or even better had a search option with facility t filter search results . 2. compare effects / compare with original option.

Great app only problem is I used to be able to isolate a person and take the filter off only on the person or have the filter only on the person and the everything else normal. I really liked this feature and idk if it got removed or if it was moved and I can't find it.

title: Digital Secure
description:
Protect your private information from digital threats. 
Digital Secure is a one-stop suite of privacy and security tools for your mobile devices and home computers. Safeguard your internet connection and personal data with antivirus, anti-malware and identity theft protection so you can browse with peace of mind. 

Here‚Äôs what you‚Äôll get with Digital Secure.
You‚Äôll get free security and privacy tools, plus you can get advanced protection for $5/mo per line or $10/mo per account.

1. Security and Privacy
Protect your device from online threats and get around-the-clock peace of mind. 
Get warnings when connecting to an unsecure network, visiting risky websites or attempting dangerous downloads. Plus, you‚Äôll be able to see how installed apps are currently using your personal information. 

2. Safe Wi-Fi 
Connect with confidence to any public Wi-Fi. 
With Digital Secure, it‚Äôs easy to make any Wi-Fi connection private. You‚Äôll get an on-the-go secure VPN connection so you‚Äôll be able to keep personal data and online activities to yourself. 

3. Identity Theft Protection (IDTP)
Take control with always-on IDTP and social media monitoring, dark web surveillance and theft alerts.
24/7 cyber monitoring means you can be notified if we detect any personal information you‚Äôve asked us to monitor is shared online. You‚Äôll also get step-by-step guidance from recovery and replacement specialists if essential items such as credit cards and IDs are lost.

title: OCD Simulator
description:
Are you sick and tired of fun, exciting games??
do you just wish you could play something awful for a while??
Well, I've got your back...

A very simple game I made while learning how to use databases, I wouldn't fully consider this a game but more of a human experiment, how far will people go to have their name on-top of a leaderboard?

Simply press the button to add 1 to your score, lets see how far people will take this?

We treat most psychiatric symptoms

Superb Doctors Who Are Also Really Nice

descriptionHTML:
Chat with a Super Doctor¬Æ psychiatrist

Use our healthcare secure app and receive your prescription by overnight shipping.

Available in most of the U.S.

Currently, we serve AR, AZ, CA, CO, CT, DC, DE, FL, HI, IA, ID, IL, IN, KY, MD, ME, MI, MN, MO, MS, MT, NE, NM, NV, NY, OH, OK, PA, RI, TN, UT, VA, WA, WV, and WY.

We treat most psychiatric symptoms

These include ADHD, panic attacks, anxiety, bipolar disorder, OCD, and depression.

We have made healthcare the way it should be

We have been treating people for over 4 years. Over 97% of our reviews are 5 stars. Although our clients can stop anytime without penalty, virtually no one does, because we treat them right and their lives are transformed.

Prescriptions to Your Door

Many medications we prescribe are $10, including free overnight shipping.

Effortless Communication

We often respond within seconds or minutes, and we never go to bed until we answer all your messages.

The Symptom Scan‚Ñ¢ gives an objective picture of your symptoms

The Symptom Scan‚Ñ¢ was developed in collaboration with some of the leading experts in the world, and the core module was validated under National Institutes of Health grant NIH MH55918 R43.

A fair price. And the initial chat and Symptom Scan‚Ñ¢ is free

You will do our Symptom Scan‚Ñ¢ and chat with a Super Doctor¬Æ psychiatrist about your symptoms and treatment options, all for free, in fact, without even entering a credit card.

Once you are confident healthPiper is terrific, you have an hour-long videochat with your Super Doctor¬Æ psychiatrist, for $199.

The package price for each month of service is $199. You can stop any time with no penalty. But we promise that you won‚Äôt want to.

Superb Doctors Who Are Also Really Nice

A wonderful doctor needs to not only to be an expert, they also have to be welcoming, kind, and good-natured. We constantly are scouring the country for terrific doctors- if a psychiatrist is on healthPiper, that means that not only are they smart, but also that they are nice, will listen to you, and work together with you as a partner to get you feeling right.
summary: Chat with Psychiatrist online for depression & treatment. Rx delivered for free.
comments: The app has problems, especially with notifications, but it still works for the purpose needed. The services themselves are better than the app performance.

Ive had an excellent experience with the doctor and Ben.They quickly have responded everytime i send a message.I did 1 video chat and They have filled my prescriptons early alot of the time .Very dependable mostly works with anxiety and depression does do adhd but u have to meet with the doctor in his office in LA.Anyhow Very friendly empathetic Doctor and assistent.
Helpful. Very professional, efficient staff. Great value. App does have glitches though.
Cant even sign up - trying to verify my phone number even though I've entered the correct verification several times now.

title: NERF Epic Pranks!
description:
The NERF battle is ON!
Can you Tag everyone without being Caught?
Grab your Nerf Blaster and Prank 'em all!

BECOME THE BEST PRANKSTER!
Tag everyone in sight, don't get caught and, above all, have fun!

UNLOCK ALL THE NERF BLASTERS!
Collect Nerf Blasters to become the ultimate prankster! Unlock them all as you progress in the game.

PERSONALIZE YOUR CHARACTER
Unlock all the fun Characters and Skins. Play as a Ninja, a Clown or even a Robot!

BATTLE IN AWESOME ENVIRONMENTS
Make your way through all the Worlds and Arenas!

title: Soap Cutting - Satisfying ASMR
description:
The most satisfying ASMR soap cutting game for antistress. You've seen it in the videos and now you get to slice, cut, and shred some amazing soaps yourself while listening to relaxing sounds and getting a tingling ASMR sensation.

Besides the relaxing sounds and ASMR effect, there‚Äôs nothing more satisfying than getting to slice and shred soap when you‚Äôre feeling stressed, making Soap Cutting the #1 antistress game of the year.
The ultimate satisfaction that comes from slicing and shredding all the different types of soap is unlike anything else! If you‚Äôve never experienced ASMR or soap cutting, just wait - this game is the best antistress tool you could find. So what are you waiting for? Start slicing!
 
 
Game Features:
- Realistic soap cutting
- Many different types of soaps. You will recognise them.
- Carve the soap
- Relaxing sounds
 
Play now and start cutting!

comments: I absolutly luv this game! It is super satisfying. You get new knife's to cut with, and you find super cool objects inside each soap that you cut. It's so calming! :3 However, one thing i dont like is that if you want to open your "mystery gift" you have to watch an ad. I dunno! maybe thats just my device but otherwise this is such an amazing game! Keep up the great work! :D

Pretty good game after all, but you need minimize the advertising. That's really annoying after each game, there's an ad. And please get rid of the vibrating... This game is played for satisfaction but it clearly annoys me on how much ads and vibrating is. When you are cutting, my phone starts vibrating and it's really unsatisfactory. Kindly make changes..

I LOVE this game, it is so satisfying and fun to do!!! The only thing that I don't really like about the game is just that there is an add after every single round, but then again I don't mind because the adds will give me something to look forward to (the satisfaction) but I would definitely recommend this game üëç‚ô•Ô∏èüëç‚ô•Ô∏è

I love this app, its relaxing and because its offline it can work when you are bored without wifi unlike some games. It's a good app and you should get it because it lives up to expectations, plus you can unlock more soap knives in different styles and colours. Also if you dont have a lot of soap, dont want to ruin it, but you want the same satisfying feeling as other vids well this game is totally for you.

I love this app! It makes a very unsatisfying noise once you are done with a level.And all of the soaps make the same sound when you cut them.But all of the good things about this app make the bad things seem very tiny.I love how satisfying this is!I wish i could soap cut in real life but my parents don't let me.I love all of the different knife types!They are very awesome.I would play this all day!Thank you CrazyGames,I hope you keep making amazing games!Plus, your ASMR slicing game is awesome!
